T02TD1396E:96b-1: a'a rya manydzu shra'i n'a ma sam gi ti aa mri ta bindu pra ti a'a lo ka bri tti n'a ma /
T02TD1396E:96b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa bdud rtsi'i thigs pa sgron ma gsal ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1396E:96b-4: 'jam dpal la gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1396E:96b-5: yul dang yul can mkha' 'dra rang bzhin can //
T02TD1396E:96b-6: nyi zla mun pa'i lam zhugs mda'i yis g-yo //
T02TD1396E:96b-7: sa mtha' las byung chu yis kun du khyab //
T02TD1396E:96b-8: bde gshegs 'jam dbyangs de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1396E:96b-9: bla ma'i zhal las brgyud pa yi //
T02TD1396E:96b-10: bdud rtsi thigs pa lta bu 'di //
T02TD1396E:96b-11: dang po sangs rgyas legs 'ongs pa //
T02TD1396E:96b-12: mtshan brjod man ngag bri bar bya //
T02TD1396E:96b-13: dpal ldan 'bras spungs mchod rten dang //
T02TD1396E:96b-14: sna tshogs rgyud don gnyer ba yi //
T02TD1396E:96b-16: sa ga'i bco lnga la 'dus so //
T02TD1396E:96b-17: de dus ston pas 'gro kun du //
T02TD1396E:96b-18: chos dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gi //
T02TD1396E:96b-20: de yi phyi dang nang dag tu //
T02TD1396E:96b-21: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor che //
T02TD1396E:96b-22: dang po sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor spros //
T02TD1396E:96b-23: lha la sogs pa thams cad la //
T02TD1396E:96b-24: dbang bskur byin te rgyud sde bzhi //
T02TD1396E:96b-25: snying po'i rgyud dang lnga po dag / rdo rje 'chang gis rgyas par gsungs //
T02TD1396E:96b-26: snying po'i snying po 'di yin no //
T02TD1396E:96b-27: bsdus te mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis //
T02TD1396E:96b-28: rang rang gnas su rgyas gdab po //
T02TD1396E:96b-29: snying po'i snying po 'di de ni //
T02TD1396E:96b-31: bye ba phrag brgyar klags grub tu //
T02TD1396E:96b-32: rab tu grags so 'di yi don //
T02TD1396E:96b-33: zab cing gting dpag dka' ba ni //
T02TD1396E:96b-34: sus kyang shes pa ma yin te //
T02TD1396E:96b-35: zla ba bzang pos dri med bshad //
T02TD1396E:96b-36: de don rigs ldan rnams la ni ;
T02TD1396E:96b-37: / bdag gis rab tu dgrol bar bya //
T02TD1396E:96b-38: 'di la bcu bzhir gsungs pa yang //
T02TD1396E:96b-39: bcu gsum don ldan sgra yi dbyings //
T02TD1396E:96b-40: gcig ni kun gyis bsngags pa'o //
T02TD1396E:96b-42: bshad par bya ba bcu gsum ni //
T02TD1396E:96b-43: zhus dang gsungs dang gzigs pa dang //
T02TD1396E:97a-0: @97a * // sgyu 'phrul dra bas rdo rje dbyings //
T02TD1396E:97a-1: chos dbyings me long so sor rtog / mnyam nyid bya grub rgyud bsdus pa //
T02TD1396E:97a-2: sngags dang rjes su yi rang dang //
T02TD1396E:97a-3: bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa //
T02TD1396E:97a-4: de las dang po thog mar ni //
T02TD1396E:97a-5: zhus pa bcu drug bstan par bya //
T02TD1396E:97a-6: 'thad pa ston pa chos kyi sku //
T02TD1396E:97a-7: dz'a landha ra'i tha yig las //
T02TD1396E:97a-8: zhu po tri sha ku ne yi //
T02TD1396E:97a-9: aa yig rkyen pas chos kun 'byung //
T02TD1396E:97a-10: ae wam ma y'a zhes bshad pa //
T02TD1396E:97a-11: de nyid rdo rje'i btsun mo yi //
T02TD1396E:97a-12: bha ga la bzhugs de nyid do //
T02TD1396E:97a-14: de nas rdo rje 'chang dpal ldan //
T02TD1396E:97a-15: gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog /'jig rten gsum las rgyal bas dpa' //
T02TD1396E:97a-16: gsang dbang rdo rje dbang phyug po //
T02TD1396E:97a-18: aa yi rnam pa bdag med pa //
T02TD1396E:97a-19: rab tur mi gnas ston pa nyid //
T02TD1396E:97a-20: rnam pa thams cad bral ba'o //
T02TD1396E:97a-21: tha yi rnam pa mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1396E:97a-22: dmigs med snying rje chen po la //
T02TD1396E:97a-23: sna tshogs dngos rnams snang ba'o //
T02TD1396E:97a-24: rdo rje gnyis med sbyor ba dang //
T02TD1396E:97a-25: stong pa snying rje'i snying po can //
T02TD1396E:97a-29: de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las //
T02TD1396E:97a-30: bsam pa thams cad yongs btang nas //
T02TD1396E:97a-31: stong par rtse gcig yid byed pa //
T02TD1396E:97a-32: nyi ma gcig tu brtags na yang //
T02TD1396E:97a-33: gal te yid ches ma gyur na //
T02TD1396E:97a-34: de tshe nga yi brjun [*brdzun?] gyi tshig / ces pas dam bca' gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:97a-35: rtags gsum dang po bar tha ma //
T02TD1396E:97a-36: dang po du sogs lnga thob pa //
T02TD1396E:97a-37: gnyis pa stong dang brgya brgya 'gags //
T02TD1396E:97a-38: tha mar nyi khri chig stong dang //
T02TD1396E:97a-39: drug brgya 'gags pas rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1396E:97a-40: dpal ni de las rang don gzhan //
T02TD1396E:97a-42: yang na gnyis med sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD1396E:97a-43: ril bu bum pa mchil lham dang //
T02TD1396E:97a-44: sa 'og mkha' spyod rkang mgyogs dang ;
T02TD1396E:97a-45: gnod sbyin mo dang bcud kyis len //
T02TD1396E:97a-46: de la sogs pa dpag med mchog / gdul dka' yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung /
T02TD1396E:97a-47: khyad par lta ba'i tshogs chen bo //
T02TD1396E:97a-48: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya dang //
T02TD1396E:97a-49: stong dang brgyad brgya sum brgya dang //
T02TD1396E:97a-50: drug cu'i dmag dpung gdul dka' ba'o //
T02TD1396E:97b-0: ci @97b phyir nyin mtshan gnod byed phyir /
T02TD1396E:97b-1: 'dul ba drug sogs dpag med kyang //
T02TD1396E:97b-2: kun gyis thul ba ma yin te //
T02TD1396E:97b-3: mchog tu mi 'dzag ye shes che //
T02TD1396E:97b-4: 'du byed rnams kyi mchog yin no //
T02TD1396E:97b-5: de ni gang las rnyed ce na //
T02TD1396E:97b-6: bum pa gtum mo lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1396E:97b-7: yan lag drug gis lus bcings pa'o //
T02TD1396E:97b-8: de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las //
T02TD1396E:97b-9: byed dang bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1396E:97b-12: 'jig rten gsum gyi sgo gsum po //
T02TD1396E:97b-13: rgyal ba rang lus bde stong rgyas //
T02TD1396E:97b-14: khro rgyu can las thag bsrings pa /
T02TD1396E:97b-15: gsang ba gsang ba lnga yin te //
T02TD1396E:97b-16: de yang rdo rje theg pa las //
T02TD1396E:97b-17: khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
T02TD1396E:97b-18: ma byin pa yang blang bar bya //
T02TD1396E:97b-19: gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya //
T02TD1396E:97b-20: brdzun gyi tshig ni smra ba yin //
T02TD1396E:97b-21: myos par gyur pa'i khu ba btung //
T02TD1396E:97b-22: de ltar spyad na grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD1396E:97b-23: zhes pa rlung ni srog yin la //
T02TD1396E:97b-24: de 'gog byed pa srog chags gsod //
T02TD1396E:97b-25: gzhan gyi bud med rang lus mdzes //
T02TD1396E:97b-26: rang gis grub pa rnam par dag / ma byin ham las thig le len //
T02TD1396E:97b-27: sems can thams cad bsgral lo zhes //
T02TD1396E:97b-28: brdzun gyi tshig ni smra ba yin //
T02TD1396E:97b-29: bde ba phyag rgya'i khu ba ni //
T02TD1396E:97b-30: rtag tu btung bar bya ba yin //
T02TD1396E:97b-31: de ltar min par dngos spyod pas //
T02TD1396E:97b-32: rdo rje dmyal bar nges par 'tshed //
T02TD1396E:97b-33: dgongs pa'i skad kyis bstan pa yin //
T02TD1396E:97b-34: dbang po dbang po lnga yin te //
T02TD1396E:97b-35: dad pa dran pa brtson 'grus dang //
T02TD1396E:97b-36: bsam gtan shes rab ldan pa yis //
T02TD1396E:97b-37: rdo rje theg pa'i lam bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD1396E:97b-38: rdo rje gsang ldan dbang lnga ldan //
T02TD1396E:97b-39: de nyid phyir na de dbang phyug / rnam par rgyas pa rdo rje'i lus //
T02TD1396E:97b-40: mi yi 'gro ba mchog yin no //
T02TD1396E:97b-42: thig le nam mkha'i khams gnas pa'o //
T02TD1396E:97b-43: spyan ni gsal bar snang ba ste //
T02TD1396E:97b-44: rtags dang ye shes nor bu brtan //
T02TD1396E:97b-45: sna tshogs padmo rtsa yi dbyibs //
T02TD1396E:97b-46: gdan la bzhugs ni skye mched dag / rang gi lag ni ro rkyang gnyis //
T02TD1396E:97b-47: rdo rje'i mchog ni gnyis med ma //
T02TD1396E:97b-48: rnam grangs mngal brten nas ni //
T02TD1396E:97b-49: nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1396E:97b-50: gsor bar brtson 'grus gnyen po yis //
T02TD1396E:97b-51: yang dang yang du byed ces pa //
T02TD1396E:97b-52: nyams su myong bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1396E:98a-0: @98a * // khro gnyer dpral ba'i thig le la //
T02TD1396E:98a-1: rim par ldan sogs bcu drug phyed //
T02TD1396E:98a-2: nyams su myong bas ye shes 'phel //
T02TD1396E:98a-3: lag na rdo rje gnyen ye shes //
T02TD1396E:98a-4: thabs chen mtha' yas rnyed pa yis //
T02TD1396E:98a-5: nyon mongs rnam dag gdul dka' 'dul //
T02TD1396E:98a-6: de 'dul dpa' bo rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1396E:98a-7: phrin las gcig go zhes brjod pa'o //
T02TD1396E:98a-8: dpa' bo de 'joms phyir na dpa' //
T02TD1396E:98a-9: 'jigs su rung ba'i nyan rang sogs //
T02TD1396E:98a-11: gzugs ni gnod sbyin des mi thub //
T02TD1396E:98a-12: mi thung byis pa'i lus 'chang ba //
T02TD1396E:98a-13: zhe sdang mi bskyod rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1396E:98a-15: / rdo rje lus la rtse mo ni //
T02TD1396E:98a-16: spyi bo'i ham dang bum pa'i aa //
T02TD1396E:98a-17: rab 'phro ba ni yar mar gshegs //
T02TD1396E:98a-18: rang gi lag ni yan lag drug / gsor byed pa ni srog rtsol sogs //
T02TD1396E:98a-19: gong nas gong du goms byed pa'o //
T02TD1396E:98a-20: de yang dgos pa ci'i phyir //
T02TD1396E:98a-21: snying rje'i don ni byang chub sems //
T02TD1396E:98a-22: de yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro las //
T02TD1396E:98a-23: ji srid sems can 'khor gnas su //
T02TD1396E:98a-24: gnas par gyur pa'i bar dag tu //
T02TD1396E:98a-25: dpal mchog mtshungs med sems can don //
T02TD1396E:98a-26: mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin //
T02TD1396E:98a-27: de phyir sems dpa' dam pa ni //
T02TD1396E:98a-28: srid pa'i zhags pas rtag mi 'jigs //
T02TD1396E:98a-29: srid bde smon pa dgag pa'i phyir //
T02TD1396E:98a-30: rtag tu 'dod chags rab myos pas //
T02TD1396E:98a-31: rtogs pa rgyas pas smin par mdzad //
T02TD1396E:98a-33: da lta'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug che //
T02TD1396E:98a-34: shes rab mi rtog chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD1396E:98a-35: yang na las dang ye shes gnyis //
T02TD1396E:98a-36: lan ni bcos ma ye shes mchog /
T02TD1396E:98a-38: thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog /'dod chags chen po rjes chags pa 'am //
T02TD1396E:98a-39: so sor sdud dang lha yi yum //
T02TD1396E:98a-40: de la brten nas rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:98a-41: dga' dang bde ba'i ye shes nyid //
T02TD1396E:98a-42: mgu ba mi ngoms spangs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:98a-43: rangs pa de yi lus sems tshim //
T02TD1396E:98a-44: btang snyoms can ni thar pa 'dod //
T02TD1396E:98a-45: 'khor ba spong sogs gnyis rtog med //
T02TD1396E:98a-46: khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa //
T02TD1396E:98a-47: zhes pa stong pa khro bo la //
T02TD1396E:98a-48: chags bral ye shes lhan skyes gzugs //
T02TD1396E:98a-49: de yang sangs rgyas thod pa las //
T02TD1396E:98a-50: dngos po thams cad skyed par byed //
T02TD1396E:98b-0: @98b stong pas bshig par byed pas te //
T02TD1396E:98b-1: bshig phyir drag po khro bo'i gzugs //
T02TD1396E:98b-2: slu ba'i ri dags rnam par spangs //
T02TD1396E:98b-3: rang bzhin stong pa'i nam mkha' ni //
T02TD1396E:98b-4: dgod cing 'dzag pa ma yin no //
T02TD1396E:98b-6: sangs rgyas mchog gi bde ba la //
T02TD1396E:98b-7: phrin las bde ba spro byed pa'o //
T02TD1396E:98b-8: don ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs //
T02TD1396E:98b-9: lus btud nas ni ma nyams pa //
T02TD1396E:98b-10: lhan cig rdzogs pa yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1396E:98b-12: bcom ldan 'das ni yas byon pas //
T02TD1396E:98b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa mas log pa'o //
T02TD1396E:98b-15: de nyid gnas su gshegs pa'o ;
T02TD1396E:98b-16: / rdzogs pa dung khang rdzogs pa la //
T02TD1396E:98b-17: sangs rgyas spangs bya spangs thob pa'o //
T02TD1396E:98b-19: thal mo rtsa dang rlung gnyis la //
T02TD1396E:98b-20: sbyar byas thig le 'phror mi ster //
T02TD1396E:98b-21: spyan sngar rdo rje bum pa'i nang //
T02TD1396E:98b-23: 'di skad gsol ni lta zhing sngom ;
T02TD1396E:98b-24: / khyab bdag 'phel sdug thig le la //
T02TD1396E:98b-25: bdag la sman pa mchog bde dang //
T02TD1396E:98b-26: dkar po'i phyogs la lus bde ba'o //
T02TD1396E:98b-27: gzhan don bde ba chen bo la //
T02TD1396E:98b-28: rjes su slob par 'dod pa'i rtan [*rten?] //
T02TD1396E:98b-29: thugs brtse bas ni rang lus kyi //
T02TD1396E:98b-30: byang chub sems ni ma 'phros par //
T02TD1396E:98b-31: rtag tu ma nyams ldan phyir ro //
T02TD1396E:98b-32: sgyu 'phrul dga' bas dga' bcu drug / mngon rdzogs dga' ba rnams thim pa'o //
T02TD1396E:98b-33: ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD1396E:98b-34: rnyed par mi 'gyur ye shes te //
T02TD1396E:98b-35: rang bzhin chos dbyings rnam dag pa //
T02TD1396E:98b-36: de ni mngon sum mthong bar mdzod //
T02TD1396E:98b-37: nyon mongs pas ni thig le nyams //
T02TD1396E:98b-38: 'khor ba rgyas par byas pa yi //
T02TD1396E:98b-39: sems 'khrul pas ni de sdug bsngal //
T02TD1396E:98b-40: sna tshogs rgyas par byas pa'o //
T02TD1396E:98b-41: mi shes ma rig bag chags stobs //
T02TD1396E:98b-42: 'dam du bying ba rgal dka' ba //
T02TD1396E:98b-43: de yang mkha' 'gro kun spyod las //
T02TD1396E:98b-44: mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang //
T02TD1396E:98b-45: khengs pa la ni rtag tu dga' //
T02TD1396E:98b-46: rtag tu gdug sems ldan kun gyis //
T02TD1396E:98b-47: gsang ba'i spyod yul 'di mi shes //
T02TD1396E:98b-49: sems can kun la nyi khri dang //
T02TD1396E:98b-50: chig stong drug brgya 'gags pas na //
T02TD1396E:98b-51: sman pa bde chen dbyer med pa'o //
T02TD1396E:98b-52: bla med 'bras bu lhan skyes bde //
T02TD1396E:99a-0: @99a * // de thob bya phyir dga' bzhi bsgom //
T02TD1396E:99a-1: rab tu gsal ba rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1396E:99a-2: zhes pa rab gsal rang bzhin la //
T02TD1396E:99a-3: chos dang gzugs su gsal ba'o //
T02TD1396E:99a-4: de nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1396E:99a-5: bcom ldan zag med ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:99a-6: ston pa thig le bde chen po ;
T02TD1396E:99a-7: /'byung gnas spyi bo'i ham yig la //
T02TD1396E:99a-8: 'gro ba'i rlung gi las rnams so //
T02TD1396E:99a-9: bla ma thabs mchog me rlung sbor //
T02TD1396E:99a-10: gnyis med 'dres pa bde ba che //
T02TD1396E:99a-11: dam tshig chen po'i bde ba bzhi //
T02TD1396E:99a-12: de nyid mkhyen pa ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:99a-13: dbang po bsam pa sgo lnga yi //
T02TD1396E:99a-14: yul dang yul can snang ba'o //
T02TD1396E:99a-15: so sor sdud pas rtags thob pa //
T02TD1396E:99a-16: mkhyen mchog ces ni de la bya //
T02TD1396E:99a-17: bcom ldan 'das ni rtogs pa'i don //
T02TD1396E:99a-18: ye shes sku ni bzhi pa'i sku //
T02TD1396E:99a-19: nyams pa bzhi pa'i sku ma yin //
T02TD1396E:99a-20: gtsug tor bde chen dpral ba'i ham //
T02TD1396E:99a-21: chen po ae yi rnam pa can //
T02TD1396E:99a-22: wam las k'a li'i phreng ba la ;
T02TD1396E:99a-23: / tshig gi bdag po zhes bshad do //
T02TD1396E:99a-24: ye shes gtsug tor thig le che //
T02TD1396E:99a-25: rang 'byung ba ni rgyu mi ltos //
T02TD1396E:99a-26: byas pa med cing rnam par spangs //
T02TD1396E:99a-27: rang nyid kyis rig bsod nams mchog / d'a ri ka pa'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD1396E:99a-28: skye ba med pa'i ye shes de //
T02TD1396E:99a-29: rdul med nam mkha'i dkyil lta bur ;
T02TD1396E:99a-30: / lus gnas bde bas rgyas pa las //
T02TD1396E:99a-31: d'a ri ka pas da lta rnyed //
T02TD1396E:99a-33: 'jam dpal nor rtse'i thig le las //
T02TD1396E:99a-34: ye shes gnyis med bde ba'i rten //
T02TD1396E:99a-36: ming ni bde chen lhan skyes te //
T02TD1396E:99a-37: yang dag brjod pa'i rgyud mang las //
T02TD1396E:99a-38: mchog gi bsgrub pa dam par gsungs //
T02TD1396E:99a-39: don zab rtogs dka' mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1396E:99a-40: rdo rje theg pa'i bsgrub bya'ang de'o //
T02TD1396E:99a-41: don ni rgya chen zhing zhes pa //
T02TD1396E:99a-42: lhan skyes dngos rnams khyab pa'o //
T02TD1396E:99a-43: don chen mtshungs med bzhi pa yi //
T02TD1396E:99a-44: dbang gis thob pa'i cig shos des //
T02TD1396E:99a-45: rab zhi ba ni phyag rgya che //
T02TD1396E:99a-46: nyan rang rnams ni skrag 'gyur pa'o //
T02TD1396E:99a-47: thog ma dga' bas dpa' ba ste //
T02TD1396E:99a-48: bar dang mchog dga' tha mar ni //
T02TD1396E:99a-49: dga' bral dge ba lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1396E:99a-50: 'das pa thos pa'i dus dag tu //
T02TD1396E:99a-51: sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa ni //
T02TD1396E:99a-52: bla mas gsungs pa thos nyams myong //
T02TD1396E:99b-0: ma 'ongs sgom @99b pa'i dus dag tu //
T02TD1396E:99b-1: rnams kyang gsungs 'gyur la ba pa //
T02TD1396E:99b-2: sgom pa nyams su myong ba'o //
T02TD1396E:99b-3: da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1396E:99b-4: bsam pas de don rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:99b-5: yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang //
T02TD1396E:99b-6: rdo rje theg pa nyams su myong //
T02TD1396E:99b-7: rang la rang gis bstan pa'o //
T02TD1396E:99b-8: rgyud chen bde chen rgyun chags pa ;
T02TD1396E:99b-9: / spas pa de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1396E:99b-10: sgyu 'phrul mngon par rtogs pa ste //
T02TD1396E:99b-12: rdo rje 'char chen ye shes sku //
T02TD1396E:99b-13: gsang sngags 'dzin ni bde chen gyi //
T02TD1396E:99b-14: ye shes lnga po gsal bar 'dzin //
T02TD1396E:99b-15: dpag med rnams ni lam bye brag / bka' bzhin du ni kun du 'od //
T02TD1396E:99b-16: ma mthong bar du rlung 'gog mchog / glur bdas gang lags bshad du gsol //
T02TD1396E:99b-17: zhes ni glu yis yid tshim byed //
T02TD1396E:99b-18: de ltar rang nyid rtogs shing bde //
T02TD1396E:99b-19: mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyis //
T02TD1396E:99b-20: mchog tu mi 'gyur ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:99b-21: thig le bzhi pa'i mtha' can no //
T02TD1396E:99b-22: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
T02TD1396E:99b-23: sbyor ba'i yan lag drug yin no //
T02TD1396E:99b-25: dga' bzhi ye shes rgyas par byas //
T02TD1396E:99b-26: nges par 'byung ni ham las skyes //
T02TD1396E:99b-27: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor bar du ni //
T02TD1396E:99b-28: rab tu gsal bar sems can la //
T02TD1396E:99b-29: ji lta bar ni bstan par bya //
T02TD1396E:99b-30: bdag gi rlung gnyis sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1396E:99b-31: bsam pa brtan pos thig le bzung //
T02TD1396E:99b-32: de las phyag rgya chen po thob //
T02TD1396E:99b-33: nyon mongs nyams pa'i sdug bsngal la //
T02TD1396E:99b-34: ma lus bsal bar gcod pa dang //
T02TD1396E:99b-35: mi shes rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1396E:99b-36: ma lus spangs phyir dngos po brten //
T02TD1396E:99b-37: bsam mi khyab par ji bzhin du //
T02TD1396E:99b-38: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag lam //
T02TD1396E:99b-39: de yangs sangs rgyas thod pa las //
T02TD1396E:99b-40: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02TD1396E:99b-41: khams gsum na ni sdig med pas //
T02TD1396E:99b-42: de bas 'dod la nan tan du //
T02TD1396E:99b-43: bu khyod kyis ni rtag tu gyis //
T02TD1396E:99b-45: sems can thig ler gnas pa'o ;
T02TD1396E:99b-46: / de yang sam pu ta las kyang //
T02TD1396E:99b-47: 'di la bsal ba ci yang med //
T02TD1396E:99b-48: bsnan par bya ba cung zad med //
T02TD1396E:99b-49: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
T02TD1396E:99b-50: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
T02TD1396E:99b-52: rnams la bshad par 'tshal bar ston //
T02TD1396E:99b-53: gsang dbang nor bu'i yan lag na //
T02TD1396E:100a-0: @100a * // rdo rje yis ni mi bskyod par //
T02TD1396E:100a-1: de skad ae wam thabs shes rab //
T02TD1396E:100a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa gyen gshegs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:100a-3: bde chen sems la gsol mdzad nas //
T02TD1396E:100a-4: thabs shes thal mo sbyar byas te //
T02TD1396E:100a-5: lus btud skar ma'i sbyor ba las //
T02TD1396E:100a-7: / de ltar dh'u t'i la brten nas //
T02TD1396E:100a-8: dga' ba bcu drug rnam dag pas //
T02TD1396E:100a-9: zhus pa'i tshig bcad bcu drug dag / zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o /
T02TD1396E:100a-11: // / le'u gnyis pa slar gsungs pa //
T02TD1396E:100a-12: byis pa'i skye bo gdul slad du //
T02TD1396E:100a-13: ston pa la sogs mi 'ga' la //
T02TD1396E:100a-14: 'dir ni chen po'i don bshad pa //
T02TD1396E:100a-15: de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
T02TD1396E:100a-16: ces pas sh'akya thub pa ni //
T02TD1396E:100a-17: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam snang che //
T02TD1396E:100a-18: aa ra li las zas gtsang thabs //
T02TD1396E:100a-19: sgyu ma chen mo shes rab la //
T02TD1396E:100a-20: don grub rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1396E:100a-21: mchog tu dga' ba bde ba che //
T02TD1396E:100a-22: bcom ldan 'das ni phyag rgya che ;
T02TD1396E:100a-23: / rdzogs pa gtsug tor thig le rdzogs //
T02TD1396E:100a-24: sangs rgyas 'khor drug dag ye shes //
T02TD1396E:100a-25: rkang gnyis mchog ni bden pa gnyis //
T02TD1396E:100a-26: yang na gtsug tor nor bu gnyis //
T02TD1396E:100a-27: nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba //
T02TD1396E:100a-28: zhes pa yi ni don bshad pa //
T02TD1396E:100a-29: 'jig rten kun du khyab pa yi //
T02TD1396E:100a-30: ye shes skyes pas ye shes kyi //
T02TD1396E:100a-31: dh'u t'i mthong rtags mthar thug pa //
T02TD1396E:100a-32: re kh'a nag po phra ba'i phra //
T02TD1396E:100a-34: de yang dang por sangs rgyas las //
T02TD1396E:100a-35: du ba smig rgyu srin bu me //
T02TD1396E:100a-36: zhes pa rtags bcu bstan pa'o //
T02TD1396E:100a-37: ring zhing rnam par rtog pa las //
T02TD1396E:100a-38: mtshan rtags thob pas blo yangs pa //
T02TD1396E:100a-39: nyin mtshan rab tu brkyang mdzad de //
T02TD1396E:100a-40: de yang 'khor lo sdom pa las //
T02TD1396E:100a-41: gang tshe goms pa brtan gyur pa //
T02TD1396E:100a-42: gsal snang dngos su mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1396E:100a-43: lce rtser phyir pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1396E:100a-44: ji srid 'dod pa de srid du //
T02TD1396E:100a-46: de tshe khams gsum po yang blta //
T02TD1396E:100a-48: 'jig rten gsum po lus ngag yid //
T02TD1396E:100a-49: snang byed kyi ni rtsa gsum nyid //
T02TD1396E:100a-50: bdud bzhi phung nyon 'chi lha bu //
T02TD1396E:100a-51: dgra rnams bdud sogs nyon mongs rnams //
T02TD1396E:100a-52: 'dul byed bde rlung thig le khams //
T02TD1396E:100b-0: @100b ma thul sems can rnams kyi lam //
T02TD1396E:100b-1: 'og bltas rtsa gsum ngan song gsum //
T02TD1396E:100b-3: de nas mi 'dzag ye shes gsum //
T02TD1396E:100b-4: sbyong bar byed pa'i lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1396E:100b-5: 'dzum bstan nas ni dga' ba bzhi //
T02TD1396E:100b-6: tshangs pa dbu ma'i lam yin te //
T02TD1396E:100b-7: gsung ni gyen rgyu'i lam yin te //
T02TD1396E:100b-8: snyan pa bde rlung sil sgra 'byung //
T02TD1396E:100b-9: 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas //
T02TD1396E:100b-10: zhes pa bcu drug rtsa rgyas pas //
T02TD1396E:100b-11: sgo gsum lhan skyes khyab pa'o //
T02TD1396E:100b-12: lag na rdo rje bsam gtan la //
T02TD1396E:100b-13: stobs po che ni lhan skyes bde //
T02TD1396E:100b-14: rim gyis byon pas dga' bzhi rgyas //
T02TD1396E:100b-15: gsang dbang rdo rje nor bu la //
T02TD1396E:100b-16: slar gsungs pa ni mthar thug nas //
T02TD1396E:100b-17: slar yang gnas su gshegs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:100b-18: snying rje che dang ldan gyur pas //
T02TD1396E:100b-19: zhes pa thams cad bde chen khyab //
T02TD1396E:100b-20: rang snang bzhin du bzhin snang ba'o //
T02TD1396E:100b-21: 'gro la rnam par rtag pa'i rlung //
T02TD1396E:100b-22: phan pa'i don du 'gog par byed //
T02TD1396E:100b-23: yum lngas longs spyod ldan pa khyod //
T02TD1396E:100b-24: ye shes lus ni rdo rje'i lus //
T02TD1396E:100b-25: 'jam dpal thig le'i khams yin te //
T02TD1396E:100b-26: ming brjod dga' ba skad cig ma //
T02TD1396E:100b-27: don chen rtog med bde ba che //
T02TD1396E:100b-28: dag par byed pa rtog spros bral //
T02TD1396E:100b-29: bcing grol thams cad de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1396E:100b-30: sdig sel ba ni srog gcod sogs //
T02TD1396E:100b-31: rtsab bzhi dag gos pa med //
T02TD1396E:100b-32: ti lo pa yi zhal nas kyang //
T02TD1396E:100b-33: ri rab gser gyi legs la gang gnas pa //
T02TD1396E:100b-34: gang gi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang //
T02TD1396E:100b-35: de bzhin skye med rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1396E:100b-36: dngos po'i rang bzhin bor nas phyag rgya che //
T02TD1396E:100b-38: nga ni mchog mi 'gyur ye shes //
T02TD1396E:100b-39: nyan par brtson pa'i rnal 'byor ni //
T02TD1396E:100b-40: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
T02TD1396E:100b-41: legs so nyon mongs ye shes rtogs //
T02TD1396E:100b-42: lag na rdo rje sbyor grub la //
T02TD1396E:100b-43: khyod legs so ni bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1396E:100b-44: gsang ba tog nor bu'i gnas ;
T02TD1396E:100b-45: / bdag po lte bar bde ba 'dzin //
T02TD1396E:100b-46: lhan cig skyes pa nyams su myong //
T02TD1396E:100b-47: de phyir gsum pa'i dus su ni //
T02TD1396E:100b-48: nga yis khyod la rab tu bstan //
T02TD1396E:100b-49: khyod ni rtog med rtse gcig pas //
T02TD1396E:100b-50: yid kyis nyon la bsgom par gyis //
T02TD1396E:100b-51: bcom ldan bha ga btsun mo'i gnas //
T02TD1396E:101a-2: de yang he yi rdo rje las //
T02TD1396E:101a-3: shin tu bzhin bzangs [*bzang] mig yangs ma //
T02TD1396E:101a-4: gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par spras //
T02TD1396E:101a-5: rang gi dbang bskur snying rje che //
T02TD1396E:101a-6: rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer la //
T02TD1396E:101a-7: spyod pa byed par rtogs par bya //
T02TD1396E:101a-9: gyen la gshegs pa gsol ba'o //
T02TD1396E:101a-10: gtsug tor chen po la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1396E:101a-11: 'khor lo drug rtsa'i rnam dag pas //
T02TD1396E:101a-12: slar gsungs shlo drug tu dag / slar gsungs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa le'u gnyis pa'o /
T02TD1396E:101a-14: // / rigs drug la gzigs le'u ni //
T02TD1396E:101a-15: de nas bcom ldan sh'akya thub //
T02TD1396E:101a-16: ces pas bcom ldan bde ba la //
T02TD1396E:101a-17: sh'akya stong pa chen po nyid //
T02TD1396E:101a-18: thub pa nor bu mi 'da' ba'o //
T02TD1396E:101a-19: gang gis gzigs na de yis gzigs //
T02TD1396E:101a-20: gang la gzigs na rigs drug la //
T02TD1396E:101a-21: ji ltar gzigs na 'khor lo drug / sangs rgyas drug tu gzigs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:101a-22: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad ni //
T02TD1396E:101a-23: 'khor lo drug lter khyab pa yis //
T02TD1396E:101a-24: 'od gsal ba ni byang chub sems //
T02TD1396E:101a-25: nor bu'i kha nas mi 'pho ba //
T02TD1396E:101a-26: mi bskyod rdo rje lhan skyes dga' //
T02TD1396E:101a-27: badzri dhri ka ste 'jig pa med //
T02TD1396E:101a-28: gsang sngags lte rtsa yi ge'i gzugs //
T02TD1396E:101a-30: 'chang ba'i rigs ni pha yin te ;
T02TD1396E:101a-31: / lte ba'i 'khor lo dzi na dzi ka / rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //
T02TD1396E:101a-32: rigs gsum rdul mun snying stobs te //
T02TD1396E:101a-33: rnam par gzigs ni mtshan nyid med //
T02TD1396E:101a-34: dang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1396E:101a-35: 'od dpag med pa a'a ro li ka /'jig rten lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD1396E:101a-37: rigs ni rin chen 'byung ldan la //
T02TD1396E:101a-39: ratna dhri ka ste gsal bar byed //
T02TD1396E:101a-40: 'jig rten zhu ba'i khu ba la //
T02TD1396E:101a-41: snang byed bde chen snang ba'o //
T02TD1396E:101a-42: rigs chen don grub ye shes sku //
T02TD1396E:101a-43: ham las 'bab pa'i phrin las byed //
T02TD1396E:101a-44: stong pas brgyan pas pradzny'a dhri ka / phyag rgya chen po rdo rje sems //
T02TD1396E:101a-45: rigs mchog rigs bsdus bde chen grol //
T02TD1396E:101a-46: thig le bcu drug yongs rdzogs pa //
T02TD1396E:101a-47: bco lnga'i mtha' can rnam par dag / de nyid gtsug tor chen po dang //
T02TD1396E:101a-48: rin po che yang de nyid do //
T02TD1396E:101a-49: chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1396E:101b-0: de la @101b ston pas cher gzigs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:101b-1: gnas dang phung po dga' ba dang //
T02TD1396E:101b-2: las dang lha dang ye shes dang //
T02TD1396E:101b-3: drug ldan de la gzigs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:101b-4: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1396E:101b-6: rigs drug la gzigs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u gsum pa'o /
T02TD1396E:101b-9: // / de nas sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni //
T02TD1396E:101b-10: mngon par byang chub le'u la //
T02TD1396E:101b-11: tshig gi bdag po sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD1396E:101b-12: tshigs su bcad pa shloka / rtsa yi dra ba ji snyed pa //
T02TD1396E:101b-13: bsdus pas 'khor lo drug tu bsdus //
T02TD1396E:101b-14: de nyid gsang sngags rgyal po drug / ldan zhing badzra dhri ka sna tshogs //
T02TD1396E:101b-16: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang //
T02TD1396E:101b-17: zhes pa kun rdzob don dam la //
T02TD1396E:101b-18: kun rdzob kun brtags gzhan dbang gnyis //
T02TD1396E:101b-19: don dam yongs su grub pa ste //
T02TD1396E:101b-20: med pa bden pa dbyer med la //
T02TD1396E:101b-22: yang na mtha' bzhi bral ba yi //
T02TD1396E:101b-23: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1396E:101b-24: nang du gnyis ni ro rkyang gnyis //
T02TD1396E:101b-25: de ni rtag chad mtha' yin pas //
T02TD1396E:101b-26: med pa kun 'dar ma nyid do //
T02TD1396E:101b-27: ma skyes rang bzhin ro gcig bar //
T02TD1396E:101b-29: de nyid mi skye chos can no //
T02TD1396E:101b-30: 'di gsungs pa ni bsam brjod med ;
T02TD1396E:101b-31: / aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ae aee ao aoo aom aa: zhes pa 'di yi don bshad na /
T02TD1396E:101b-32: ma ning bzhi ni ma bshad pa //
T02TD1396E:101b-33: skye med ston pa'i rgyud yin phyir //
T02TD1396E:101b-34: yi ge bcu gnyis bsten pa ni //
T02TD1396E:101b-35: sa bcu gnyis su bstan pa yin //
T02TD1396E:101b-36: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni //
T02TD1396E:101b-37: zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni //
T02TD1396E:101b-41: dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang //
T02TD1396E:101b-42: thung du drug ni dang po la //
T02TD1396E:101b-43: ring ba drug ni nye ba'o //
T02TD1396E:101b-45: gnas pa longs spyod thim pa dang //
T02TD1396E:101b-46: bzhi bzhis rlung 'gags mchog thob po //
T02TD1396E:101b-47: 'o na thob lam sa de gang //
T02TD1396E:101b-48: zhe na aa sogs bcu gnyis ni //
T02TD1396E:102a-1: mkhyen dang ni so sor rig / dang po'i thung gsum sgo gsum dga' //
T02TD1396E:102a-2: dang po ring gsum mchog tu dga' //
T02TD1396E:102a-3: gnyis pa thung gsum dag 'bral ba //
T02TD1396E:102a-4: ring gsum lhan cig skyes dga'o //
T02TD1396E:102a-5: dga' bzhi'i rang bzhin pha rol phyin //
T02TD1396E:102a-6: ma skyes pa yi don bshad pa'o ;
T02TD1396E:102a-7: / de la skye ba'i rnam 'phrul ni //
T02TD1396E:102a-8: sthi to hri di thig le la //
T02TD1396E:102a-9: dzny'a na m'urtti bde chen te //
T02TD1396E:102a-10: ra ham buddto sbangs rtogs ldan //
T02TD1396E:102a-12: tya dhva bartti n'am ni rlung gsum bsgom //
T02TD1396E:102a-13: aom badzra t'i kshna zhes pa ni //
T02TD1396E:102a-14: nor bu mi bskyod rlung gcod pa'o //
T02TD1396E:102a-15: du: kha srid pa tstshe da ni //
T02TD1396E:102a-16: lte ba'i nang gnas rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1396E:102a-18: dzny'a na m'urtta ye snying ga / dzny'a na k'a ya don grub ste //
T02TD1396E:102a-19: dpral bar gnas pa thig le'i khams //
T02TD1396E:102a-20: w'a g'i shva ra rin chen 'byung //
T02TD1396E:102a-21: mgrin par chos kyi phung po gnas //
T02TD1396E:102a-22: aa ra pa tsa na rdor sems //
T02TD1396E:102a-23: gtsug tor gnas pa bcom ldan 'das ;
T02TD1396E:102a-25: yang na aa ra pa tsa na //
T02TD1396E:102a-26: zhes pa'i yi ge don bshad na //
T02TD1396E:102a-27: mi 'gyur ye shes rtogs pa yis //
T02TD1396E:102a-28: 'dod chags la sogs sman chen bsten //
T02TD1396E:102a-29: mi 'chi lnga spyad dngos grub thob //
T02TD1396E:102a-30: gsang spyod rigs spyod kun du bzang //
T02TD1396E:102a-31: rnal 'byor rig pas dpyad par bya //
T02TD1396E:102a-32: aindra bh'u ti'i gsung ngag yin //
T02TD1396E:102a-33: de ltar tshigs bcad gsum po des //
T02TD1396E:102a-34: lus ngag yid gsum rnam dag pa'o //
T02TD1396E:102a-35: sngags kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o /
T02TD1396E:102a-37: // / le'u lnga pa rdo rje dbyings //
T02TD1396E:102a-38: dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa ni //
T02TD1396E:102a-39: phung khams dag pa chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD1396E:102a-40: 'di ltar phyag rgya chen po la //
T02TD1396E:102a-42: rtag tu rgyas bde kun du bzang //
T02TD1396E:102a-43: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor rgyas pa'o //
T02TD1396E:102a-44: aa las 'byung ni shes rab phyin //
T02TD1396E:102a-45: 'od gsal phyag rgya chen mo la //
T02TD1396E:102a-46: gzugs brnyan snang ba ma m'a k'i //
T02TD1396E:102a-47: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ma ning rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin //
T02TD1396E:102a-48: rlung 'gog bzlas pa mchog sgrol ma //
T02TD1396E:102a-49: don chen yi ge yon tan la //
T02TD1396E:102a-50: dam pa thams cad ster bar byed //
T02TD1396E:102a-51: khong nas 'byung ba gtum mo'i me //
T02TD1396E:102a-52: de yang he yi rdo rje las //
T02TD1396E:102b-0: lte bar gtum mo sbar ba @102b yis ;
T02TD1396E:102b-1: / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
T02TD1396E:102b-2: spyan sogs yang ni bsregs byas nas //
T02TD1396E:102b-3: ham las ri bong can 'dzag go //
T02TD1396E:102b-5: srog chen rdzogs byed gos dkar mo //
T02TD1396E:102b-6: tshig tu brjod pa nyams pa'i mtha' //
T02TD1396E:102b-7: spangs pa bde chen brtan spyan ma //
T02TD1396E:102b-8: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / bde stong dbyer med ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:102b-9: tshig kun rtsa rlung yi ge'i gzugs //
T02TD1396E:102b-10: gtum mos klag pas bde stong gsal //
T02TD1396E:102b-11: de nyid rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1396E:102b-12: nyams su myong ba mchod pa ste //
T02TD1396E:102b-13: phyi rol rdzas rnams rgya chen phul //
T02TD1396E:102b-14: dam pa gsum gyis bsngo byas nas //
T02TD1396E:102b-16: thar pa'i rgyur gyur shin tu dka' //
T02TD1396E:102b-17: thar pa'i ci smos khams gong ma'i //
T02TD1396E:102b-18: rgyur gyur pa yang ting 'dzin dang //
T02TD1396E:102b-19: de byed rnam par g-yengs phyir ro //
T02TD1396E:102b-20: de nas mchod chen ma yin no //
T02TD1396E:102b-21: bdud rtsi bsten sogs 'dod yon spyad //
T02TD1396E:102b-22: de yang rgyud pa'i rgyu min pas //
T02TD1396E:102b-23: mchod chen ma yin mchod chen ni //
T02TD1396E:102b-24: dug lnga'i de nyid rtogs pa de'i //
T02TD1396E:102b-25: gsum pa'i ye shes gcig pu yin //
T02TD1396E:102b-26: chen po'i shes rab ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:102b-27: 'dod chags gsum dus ye shes che //
T02TD1396E:102b-28: sems can las can skal bzang la //
T02TD1396E:102b-29: sgo gsum dpag med dga' bar byed //
T02TD1396E:102b-30: mchod pa chen po gong bzhin la //
T02TD1396E:102b-31: zhe sdang che ni rlung 'gog pa'o //
T02TD1396E:102b-32: des ni bde g-yos rtog med pas //
T02TD1396E:102b-33: sbang bya nyon mongs kun gyi sgra //
T02TD1396E:102b-34: che ba 'di la mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1396E:102b-35: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
T02TD1396E:102b-36: srog rtsol dh'u t'i'i lam zhugs pas //
T02TD1396E:102b-37: gti mug blo ni shes rab la //
T02TD1396E:102b-38: gti mug sel ba snang mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1396E:102b-39: mchod pa chen po gong dang mtshungs //
T02TD1396E:102b-40: khro ba chen po nyams pa 'joms //
T02TD1396E:102b-41: yang na dga' bral ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:102b-42: khro ba chen po lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1396E:102b-43: drag po chen po don grub po //
T02TD1396E:102b-44: mchod pa chen po 'dod pa che //
T02TD1396E:102b-45: bde bas sems bsdus mi rtog rgyas //
T02TD1396E:102b-46: de yis 'dod pa thams cad nyid //
T02TD1396E:102b-47: sel bar byed phyir rin po che //
T02TD1396E:102b-48: chags pa nyid na chags pa med //
T02TD1396E:102b-49: 'dod sogs lnga po dbyer med pa //
T02TD1396E:102b-51: 'dod pa chen po lus bde ba //
T02TD1396E:102b-52: bde ba chen po gang bde ba //
T02TD1396E:103a-1: ba chen po sems bde ba //
T02TD1396E:103a-2: mgu ba che ni ye shes bde //
T02TD1396E:103a-3: de yang ma log gnyid song dang //
T02TD1396E:103a-4: rmi lam rmi lam chen po dang //
T02TD1396E:103a-5: de nyid sbrul longs spyod bde chen //
T02TD1396E:103a-6: dga' ba dga' bzhir nyams su myong //
T02TD1396E:103a-7: gzungs che thig les lingga rgyas //
T02TD1396E:103a-8: lus kyang 'od gsal che ba ste //
T02TD1396E:103a-9: longs spyod rdzogs sku yul rgyas pa'o //
T02TD1396E:103a-10: de ni lus kyi dga' ba mchog / kha dog che zhing yon tan rgyas //
T02TD1396E:103a-11: lus po che ba dh'u t'i rgyas //
T02TD1396E:103a-12: de ni ngag gi mchog dga'o //
T02TD1396E:103a-13: ming yang che zhing mchog gsang theg / rgya che des khyab bde sems dga' //
T02TD1396E:103a-14: dkyil ni bde ba snying po la //
T02TD1396E:103a-15: 'khor ni rtsa thig rlung gis bskor //
T02TD1396E:103a-16: chen po'i chos nyid yangs pa yin //
T02TD1396E:103a-17: sgyu ma lta bur shar ba'o //
T02TD1396E:103a-18: de ni ye shes mchog dga'o //
T02TD1396E:103a-19: de ni longs sku'i dga' bzhi'o //
T02TD1396E:103a-20: shes rab mtshon chen stong pa nyid //
T02TD1396E:103a-22: nyon mongs chen po las brgya yi //
T02TD1396E:103a-23: padma la brten skyes pa yi //
T02TD1396E:103a-24: bde myong lus kyi dga' bral dga' //
T02TD1396E:103a-25: lcags kyu'i mchog ni ye shes kyi //
T02TD1396E:103a-27: de ni ngag gi dga' bral dga' //
T02TD1396E:103a-28: grags chen me rlung sgra yin la //
T02TD1396E:103a-29: snyan grags gsal snang ye shes te //
T02TD1396E:103a-30: sems kyi dga' bral dga' ba'o //
T02TD1396E:103a-31: snang ba chen po rdo rje thabs //
T02TD1396E:103a-32: gsal ba chen po shes rab yum //
T02TD1396E:103a-33: gnyis med sbyor bas bde rgyas pa //
T02TD1396E:103a-34: ye shes dga' bral dga' ba'o //
T02TD1396E:103a-35: mkhas pa bde stong thabs la mkhas //
T02TD1396E:103a-37: de ni lus kyi lhan skyes dga' ;
T02TD1396E:103a-38: / sgyu 'phrul chen po phyag rgya bzhi //
T02TD1396E:103a-39: 'grub pa med pas don grub pa'o //
T02TD1396E:103a-40: ngag gi lhan cig skyes dga'o //
T02TD1396E:103a-41: sgyu 'phrul chen po bha ga la //
T02TD1396E:103a-42: dga' bas dga' ni bde myong ba'o //
T02TD1396E:103a-43: de ni sems kyi lhan skyes dga' ba'o //
T02TD1396E:103a-46: de ni ye shes lhan skyes dga' //
T02TD1396E:103a-47: gtsug tor rdo rje nor bu'i bar //
T02TD1396E:103a-48: dga' gsum dga' ba bcu gnyis las //
T02TD1396E:103a-49: mas yar dga' ba dga' bzhi ste //
T02TD1396E:103a-50: gnyis mnyam gnyis gnas dbus dag na //
T02TD1396E:103a-51: bde dang mi rtog mtshan dang bral //
T02TD1396E:103b-0: lhan cig skyes pa'i yul can @103b la ;
T02TD1396E:103b-1: / dga' bral rtog zhes brjod du gsungs //
T02TD1396E:103b-2: dga' ba rnam pa bcu drug go //
T02TD1396E:103b-3: rgyas par bshad pa dri med ltos //
T02TD1396E:103b-4: sbyin bdag chen po phyi nang gtong //
T02TD1396E:103b-5: gtso bo sgeg mos lhan skyes ster //
T02TD1396E:103b-7: tshul khrims chen po byang chub sems //
T02TD1396E:103b-8: 'chang ba mi mnyam nor bu yi //
T02TD1396E:103b-9: rtse mor phreng ba mnyams [?] mchog / bzod chen bde bas sems bsdus blus //
T02TD1396E:103b-11: brtson 'grus chen po g-yas g-yon rlung //
T02TD1396E:103b-12: dh'u t'ir brtul ba 'phar g-yo gar //
T02TD1396E:103b-13: bsam gtan chen po bde stong la //
T02TD1396E:103b-14: ting 'dzin me tog rtse gcig blta //
T02TD1396E:103b-15: shes rab chen po stong pa nyid //
T02TD1396E:103b-16: lus ni ma rig mun pa'i dngos //
T02TD1396E:103b-18: stobs po che ni rlung grub pa //
T02TD1396E:103b-19: mkha' la 'gro ba'i bdug spos can //
T02TD1396E:103b-20: thabs che bas ni bde 'phel bas //
T02TD1396E:103b-21: lus rnams kun la khyab par byug / smon lam khu ba mnyam za bas //
T02TD1396E:103b-22: chos rnams dpe brgyad sa spyod ma //
T02TD1396E:103b-23: ye shes me rlung rgya mtsho ni //
T02TD1396E:103b-24: bindu dung khang gnas pa ste //
T02TD1396E:103b-25: mkha' spyod rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1396E:103b-26: byams chen shes bya bde bar shar //
T02TD1396E:103b-27: rang bzhin spros bral dpag med rtogs //
T02TD1396E:103b-28: snying rje chen po chags bcas la //
T02TD1396E:103b-29: blo yi mchog ni bde stong myong //
T02TD1396E:103b-30: shes rab chen po gang du yang //
T02TD1396E:103b-31: dmigs su med pa phyag rgya che //
T02TD1396E:103b-32: blo chen ldan ni dga' bzhi'o //
T02TD1396E:103b-33: mkhas pa chen po zhes pa ni //
T02TD1396E:103b-34: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las //
T02TD1396E:103b-35: sems dpa' reg pa chags pa rgyas //
T02TD1396E:103b-36: shin tu chags chen 'dar ba dang //
T02TD1396E:103b-38: myos dang brgyal ba bcu ru 'dod //
T02TD1396E:103b-39: de nyid nang du sbyar ba yis //
T02TD1396E:103b-40: so so bsdu ba'i mtshan ma bcu //
T02TD1396E:103b-41: thabs chen yul ni nyi shu bzhir //
T02TD1396E:103b-42: bde bas khyab pa dpa' bo'o //
T02TD1396E:103b-43: rdzu 'phrul chen bo'i stobs dang ldan //
T02TD1396E:103b-45: shugs chen byang sems mi nyams pa //
T02TD1396E:103b-46: mgyogs pa chen po rtsa kun khyab //
T02TD1396E:103b-47: rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa //
T02TD1396E:103b-49: bde bas bdag gzhan bskul nus pa'o //
T02TD1396E:103b-50: stobs chen mtshams med lnga sogs las //
T02TD1396E:103b-51: pha rol gnod pa des mi gos //
T02TD1396E:103b-52: de yang rdo rje theg pa las //
T02TD1396E:104a-2: mtshams med lnga sogs byed pa'i mi //
T02TD1396E:104a-3: gsod pa don du gnyer bas kyang //
T02TD1396E:104a-6: srid pa'i ri bo 'jig tshogs kyi //
T02TD1396E:104a-7: lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02TD1396E:104a-8: chen po gzhig par dka' ba'o //
T02TD1396E:104a-9: 'joms ni bde chen spros bral lo //
T02TD1396E:104a-10: bde chen thob rtags gang zhe na //
T02TD1396E:104a-11: mkhregs shing nor bu'i rtsa gnas la //
T02TD1396E:104a-12: rdo rje chen po lingga rgyas //
T02TD1396E:104a-14: de nyid drag po chen po ste //
T02TD1396E:104a-15: drag shul chen po dug gsum 'joms //
T02TD1396E:104a-18: mgon po rigs mchog phyag rgya che //
T02TD1396E:104a-19: chen po de las lhag med pa'o //
T02TD1396E:104a-20: bla ma bde ba chen po la //
T02TD1396E:104a-21: gsang sngags bde ba'i dam tshig bsrung //
T02TD1396E:104a-22: che ba'i mchog ni thabs mchog go //
T02TD1396E:104a-23: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
T02TD1396E:104a-26: de nas theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD1396E:104a-27: tshul ni he ru bdag med ma //
T02TD1396E:104a-28: mchog ni rdo rje padmar sbyor //
T02TD1396E:104a-29: gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying //
T02TD1396E:104a-30: lte ba gsang ba nor bu rtse //
T02TD1396E:104a-31: 'gro dang byon pa bcu bzhi yis //
T02TD1396E:104a-32: tshigs bcad bcu bzhi rnam par dag / rdo rje'i lus nyid rdo rje dbyings //
T02TD1396E:104a-33: gnas bdun byon gshegs bde myong ba //
T02TD1396E:104a-35: brgyad brgya bcu gnyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:104a-36: rdo rje dbyings kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u lnga pa'o /
T02TD1396E:104a-38: // / le'u drug pa chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD1396E:104a-39: rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1396E:104a-40: sangs rgyas bde chen gsol bar mdzad //
T02TD1396E:104a-41: rnam par snang mdzad 'od gsal che //
T02TD1396E:104a-42: thub pa chen po mi nyams bde //
T02TD1396E:104a-43: thub chen ldan ba sgo gsum brgyas //
T02TD1396E:104a-44: gsang sngags tshul chen bde stong la //
T02TD1396E:104a-45: de las byung ba 'dod yon lam //
T02TD1396E:104a-46: gsang sngags tshul chen dbang bzhi la //
T02TD1396E:104a-47: rig pa bzhi yi bdag nyid can ;
T02TD1396E:104a-48: / pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
T02TD1396E:104a-49: ces pa bum dbang rdzas bcu ster //
T02TD1396E:104a-50: gsum la rdzas gsum ster sbyin pa //
T02TD1396E:104a-51: gnyis sbyor byang sems brtan 'dzin pa //
T02TD1396E:104a-52: tshul khrims rtog bral bzod pa'o //
T02TD1396E:104a-53: brtson 'grus ba thag tsam mi 'jig / bde stong mi g-yo bsam gtan no //
T02TD1396E:104b-0: shes @104b rab lha mo'i phyag rgya las //
T02TD1396E:104b-1: bla ma'i zhal las rnyed pa'o //
T02TD1396E:104b-2: thabs ni gong gis ma rtogs na //
T02TD1396E:104b-3: kar na bcu la brten nas //
T02TD1396E:104b-4: 'gog dang zlog dang khyab sogs thabs //
T02TD1396E:104b-5: de yang sngom brgya mtsho las //
T02TD1396E:104b-6: kun du tsum ba kunda li //
T02TD1396E:104b-7: na khas rtse dang n'a das rtse //
T02TD1396E:104b-8: yang dag sbyor dang srid ces smra //
T02TD1396E:104b-9: nyed cing skyes pa ltar byed pa //
T02TD1396E:104b-10: brgyad la brgyad brgyad dbye ba yis //
T02TD1396E:104b-11: byed pa drug cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur //
T02TD1396E:104b-13: smon lam bde chen mi 'bral ba //
T02TD1396E:104b-14: stobs ni bzlog dka' zlog pa'o //
T02TD1396E:104b-15: ye shes lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02TD1396E:104b-16: phyin bcu thob pas dbang rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:104b-17: de yang kamba'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD1396E:104b-18: dur khrod chen po'i dgon par rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis //
T02TD1396E:104b-19: gser snod dag tu seng ge'i zho ldugs tshe na phan tshun du //
T02TD1396E:104b-20: dbul ba sel dang bsil ba thob pas dang po gnyis //
T02TD1396E:104b-21: rjes chags khro med le lo med pas gnyis pas gsum dang bzhi //
T02TD1396E:104b-22: rtse gcig rtog bral gsum pas lnga pa drug pa de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD1396E:104b-23: 'gog len khyab byed gnas pa 'khrul 'khor rlung thabs stobs //
T02TD1396E:104b-24: gnas dang nye gnas la sogs bcu gnyis smon 'debs de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1396E:104b-25: bde dang cig shos dbyer med gnas pa gzhi ni bzhi pa ste //
T02TD1396E:104b-26: bla ma dam pa'i drin gyis bdag la 'di 'dra gsal bar snang //
T02TD1396E:104b-28: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
T02TD1396E:104b-29: zhes pa khams bcu 'joms pa ste //
T02TD1396E:104b-30: rlung dang sems dang byang chub sems //
T02TD1396E:104b-31: khrag dang rkang dang rus pa dang //
T02TD1396E:104b-32: rus pa sha dang dbang po dang //
T02TD1396E:104b-33: pags pa la sogs bcu po de //
T02TD1396E:104b-34: bde bas khyab brtan gnas pa'o //
T02TD1396E:104b-35: de nyid gnas dang dag par 'dod //
T02TD1396E:104b-36: pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste //
T02TD1396E:104b-37: zhes pa yul dang yul can dag / pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul //
T02TD1396E:104b-38: zhes pa ka ran bcu yis //
T02TD1396E:104b-39: bde stong skyes pa tshul chen no //
T02TD1396E:104b-40: mgon po bde chen he ru ka / sa bcu gnas dang nye gnas sogs //
T02TD1396E:104b-41: dbang phyug mi 'dzag dga' ye shes //
T02TD1396E:104b-42: sa bcu la ni gnas pa'o //
T02TD1396E:104b-43: zhes pa kar na bcu la //
T02TD1396E:104b-44: sbyin sogs re res brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1396E:104b-45: shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can //
T02TD1396E:104b-46: zhes pa lta stangs shes pa las //
T02TD1396E:104b-47: rnam dag thob rtags rnam pa bcu //
T02TD1396E:104b-48: du ba smig rgyu srin bu me //
T02TD1396E:104b-49: 'bar ba zla sngon mkha' dag dang //
T02TD1396E:104b-50: thig le re kh'a nag po'o //
T02TD1396E:105a-0: @105a * // bdag nyid can ni sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:105a-1: longs sku mthong ba yin par 'dod //
T02TD1396E:105a-2: shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po //
T02TD1396E:105a-3: zhes pa bug med nam mkha' dag / bltas te dbang po yul yul can //
T02TD1396E:105a-4: gcig tu gyur pa mthong ba ni //
T02TD1396E:105a-5: sbyor ba yan lag drug yin te //
T02TD1396E:105a-6: rtags rtogs ldan pa 'chang ba yin //
T02TD1396E:105a-7: dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas las //
T02TD1396E:105a-8: nam mkhar sems gtad mig mi 'dzums //
T02TD1396E:105a-9: rdo rje lam zhugs rtags bcu mthong //
T02TD1396E:105a-11: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don //
T02TD1396E:105a-12: zhes pa rnam bcu gong rtags la //
T02TD1396E:105a-13: sha la sogs pa spyan lnga yis //
T02TD1396E:105a-14: yul dang yul can mthong ba'o ;
T02TD1396E:105a-15: / thub dbang stobs bcu zhes pa ni //
T02TD1396E:105a-16: gyen thur med khyab srog dang ni //
T02TD1396E:105a-17: klu dang rus rtsangs nor lha sbyin //
T02TD1396E:105a-18: khyab pa'i bdag nyid bde stong ngo //
T02TD1396E:105a-19: kun gyi nyi khri chig stong la //
T02TD1396E:105a-20: don ni 'gog cing ma lus byed //
T02TD1396E:105a-21: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
T02TD1396E:105a-22: me dang zla ba nyid ma dang //
T02TD1396E:105a-23: thig le nag po thig le che ;
T02TD1396E:105a-24: / sangs rgyas longs sku mthong ba'o //
T02TD1396E:105a-25: de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas las //
T02TD1396E:105a-26: tshe las yo byad skye dang chos //
T02TD1396E:105a-27: rdzu 'phrul mos smon sems ye shes //
T02TD1396E:105a-28: rtags bcu'i grub pa dbang bcu'o //
T02TD1396E:105a-30: thog ma med pa dga' ba la //
T02TD1396E:105a-31: spros med bdag ni mchog dga'o //
T02TD1396E:105a-32: de bzhin nyid ni lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1396E:105a-33: dag pa'i bdag ni dga' bral lo //
T02TD1396E:105a-34: bden par rang bzhin myong bzhin pa //
T02TD1396E:105a-35: smra zhing rigs ldan bu la ni //
T02TD1396E:105a-36: tshig mi 'gyur ni don dang rtags //
T02TD1396E:105a-37: bde ba che la sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1396E:105a-38: shes rab bu ni bla ma yis //
T02TD1396E:105a-39: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
T02TD1396E:105a-41: / gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
T02TD1396E:105a-42: zhes pa 'di yi don bshad na //
T02TD1396E:105a-43: dang po rtog pa bsgom pa ste //
T02TD1396E:105a-44: de nas rtog med skye ba yin //
T02TD1396E:105a-47: s'a lu las ni khre min no //
T02TD1396E:105a-48: des na rtog med rgyu las ni //
T02TD1396E:105a-49: 'bras bu rtog med ye shes skye //
T02TD1396E:105a-50: yang dag ye shes mtha' nor bu //
T02TD1396E:105a-51: de la rnam par gnas pa ni //
T02TD1396E:105a-52: mi 'dzag ye shes dga' ba'i sems //
T02TD1396E:105a-53: bdag med chos rnams brjod du med //
T02TD1396E:105a-54: seng ge rim gnon sgra ldan pas //
T02TD1396E:105a-55: mu stegs de nyid mi shes pa //
T02TD1396E:105a-56: stong sgras ri dags ngan 'jigs byed //
T02TD1396E:105b-0: kun du 'gro ba bde @105b chen po ;
T02TD1396E:105b-1: / don yod stobs ni sbyor bas brtson //
T02TD1396E:105b-2: ji ltar 'bab pa de bzhin du /
T02TD1396E:105b-3: dung khang gnas su slar gshegs pa'i //
T02TD1396E:105b-4: bde chen khyab pa yid ltar mgyogs //
T02TD1396E:105b-5: rgyal ba 'dod chags las rgyal dga' //
T02TD1396E:105b-6: rnam rgyal rlung rgyal dga' ye shes //
T02TD1396E:105b-7: dgra las rgyal ba ma rig sogs //
T02TD1396E:105b-8: rten 'brel las rgyal lhan skyes so //
T02TD1396E:105b-9: 'khor lo drug la sgyur pa ni //
T02TD1396E:105b-10: rtsa la thig les brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1396E:105b-11: stobs po che ni dpung bzhi ste //
T02TD1396E:105b-12: snang ba thob dang snang ba mched //
T02TD1396E:105b-13: brtan dang de khon zhus bzhi'o //
T02TD1396E:105b-14: tshogs kyi stong phrag bdun cu gnyis //
T02TD1396E:105b-15: slob dpon shu kra ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:105b-16: tshogs kyi dga' gsum mchog ldan skyes //
T02TD1396E:105b-17: tshogs ni skad cig gsum yin te //
T02TD1396E:105b-18: rje ni mtshan med skad cig ma //
T02TD1396E:105b-19: tshogs ni phyag rgya gsum yin te //
T02TD1396E:105b-20: bdag po phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD1396E:105b-21: chos can bco brgyad de dag la //
T02TD1396E:105b-22: dbang dang ldan pas dbang ldan no //
T02TD1396E:105b-23: mthu chen bde chen gces pa la //
T02TD1396E:105b-24: rtag tu nyams med 'dzin pa ste //
T02TD1396E:105b-25: de nyid tshul chen rtags bcu thob //
T02TD1396E:105b-26: gzhan dring mi 'jog bcos ma med //
T02TD1396E:105b-27: tshig rje dag gis mchog sbyin nus //
T02TD1396E:105b-28: tshig ni so sor yang dag rig / tshig bdag smra mkhas zhes pa ni //
T02TD1396E:105b-29: grub chen brgyad sogs phrin las rnams //
T02TD1396E:105b-30: tshig gi nus pas nges tshig rig / tshig la dbang ba don rig pa'o //
T02TD1396E:105b-31: tshig mtha' yas pa shes rab rgyas //
T02TD1396E:105b-32: spobs pa so sor rig pa'o //
T02TD1396E:105b-33: tshig bden kun rdzob lha dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1396E:105b-34: bden par smra ba don dam ste //
T02TD1396E:105b-35: rdzogs rim rnam pa bzhi yin no //
T02TD1396E:105b-36: de yang mkha' 'gro kun spyod las //
T02TD1396E:105b-37: thams cad bden pa gnyis la ni //
T02TD1396E:105b-38: brten par ngas ni rtag bshad pa //
T02TD1396E:105b-39: rnal 'byor ba yi dngos grub phyir //
T02TD1396E:105b-40: sgom pa mngon du gyur pa yin //
T02TD1396E:105b-41: rgyud rnams kyi ni rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1396E:105b-42: bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten //
T02TD1396E:105b-44: bden pa bzhi ni sdug bsngal sogs //
T02TD1396E:105b-45: ston pa'i ni dga' bzhir ston //
T02TD1396E:105b-46: phyir mi ldog pa rlung grub pas //
T02TD1396E:105b-47: phyir mi 'ong ba thig le brtan //
T02TD1396E:105b-48: 'dren pa rang gis rig gi rlung //
T02TD1396E:105b-50: rang rgyal de yis khams rgyas pa //
T02TD1396E:105b-51: bse ru aa wa dh'u t'i yin //
T02TD1396E:106a-2: sna tshogs theg pa sna tshogs lam //
T02TD1396E:106a-3: las byung ji ltar de ltar snang //
T02TD1396E:106a-4: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po //
T02TD1396E:106a-5: zhes pa 'byung ba lnga yin la //
T02TD1396E:106a-6: chen po de las chos kun skyes //
T02TD1396E:106a-7: rgyu ni rgyu dang rkyen nyid do //
T02TD1396E:106a-8: gcig po chos dang chos can gyis //
T02TD1396E:106a-9: rgyu rkyen gyur pa 'di nyid yin //
T02TD1396E:106a-10: chos ni 'byung la chos can ni //
T02TD1396E:106a-11: rnam par shes pa de la drug / shes pa skye ba'ang chos yin te //
T02TD1396E:106a-12: shes pa nyid na ci zhig shes //
T02TD1396E:106a-13: shes med sems ni 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1396E:106a-14: don dam des na mya ngan 'das //
T02TD1396E:106a-16: theg pa chen po'i bsgrub bya ni //
T02TD1396E:106a-17: srid pa gsum la dmigs nas ni //
T02TD1396E:106a-18: mig 'phrul lta bu'i rnam pa yis //
T02TD1396E:106a-19: lam la thub pa'i yon tan len //
T02TD1396E:106a-22: de nyid don du bden 'dod pa //
T02TD1396E:106a-23: nyan thos phyi rol pa yi lugs //
T02TD1396E:106a-24: shes pa snang ba yin no zhes //
T02TD1396E:106a-25: gsal ba dam pa'i don 'dod pa //
T02TD1396E:106a-26: cig shos rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams //
T02TD1396E:106a-28: khyad par cung zad yod min pas //
T02TD1396E:106a-29: kun rdzob mig 'phrul lta bur snang //
T02TD1396E:106a-30: don dam rang bzhin med pa nyid //
T02TD1396E:106a-31: gnyis med phyag rgya chen por 'dod //
T02TD1396E:106a-32: rdo rje gsum gyi byed pa la //
T02TD1396E:106a-34: sku rdo rje la sra ba sa //
T02TD1396E:106a-35: gsher ba chu ste dro ba me //
T02TD1396E:106a-36: bskyong [*bskyod?] pa rlung ste go 'byed mkha' //
T02TD1396E:106a-37: gsung rdo rje yi rnam pa ni //
T02TD1396E:106a-38: a'a li shes rab ye shes khams //
T02TD1396E:106a-39: k'a li thabs las khams lnga 'byung //
T02TD1396E:106a-40: ka tsa ta ta pa lnga sa //
T02TD1396E:106a-41: kha tsha tha tha pha lnga chu //
T02TD1396E:106a-42: ga dza da da ba lnga me //
T02TD1396E:106a-43: gha dzha dha dha pha lnga rlung //
T02TD1396E:106a-44: nga nya na na ma lnga mkha' //
T02TD1396E:106a-45: ka tsa ta ta pa ye shes //
T02TD1396E:106a-46: mgrin rkang spyi bo mchu so las //
T02TD1396E:106a-47: 'byung phyir mkha' rlung me chu sa //
T02TD1396E:106a-48: aa ku ae kam ha lnga ni //
T02TD1396E:106a-49: mgrin sgra nam mkha'i khams yin no //
T02TD1396E:106a-50: ai tsu ksha ya sha lnga ni //
T02TD1396E:106a-51: rkan sgra rlung gi khams yin no //
T02TD1396E:106a-52: ri tu ra sha aa lnga ni //
T02TD1396E:106a-53: spyi bo'i sgra ste me yi khams //
T02TD1396E:106a-54: au pu pa wa ao lnga ni //
T02TD1396E:106a-55: mchu sgra chu yi khams yin no //
T02TD1396E:106a-56: li tu la sa aal lnga ni //
T02TD1396E:106a-57: so sgra sa yi khams yin no //
T02TD1396E:106a-58: 'byung gnas lnga las byung ba yi //
T02TD1396E:106b-0: 'byung ba'i nus @106b pa'i me tog ni //
T02TD1396E:106b-1: kha dog yi ge dug lngar smin //
T02TD1396E:106b-2: yi ge dang po'i sgra brtag pa //
T02TD1396E:106b-3: dbyangs dgra dbyangs la gsal byed dgra //
T02TD1396E:106b-4: gsal byed rang nyid yin par 'dod //
T02TD1396E:106b-5: gsal dbyangs thabs shes gnod pa med //
T02TD1396E:106b-6: dbyangs yig dgra gyur 'chi ba ste //
T02TD1396E:106b-7: gsal byed dgrar gyur nad kyis thebs //
T02TD1396E:106b-8: yan lag dgrar gyur dpal 'phrog byed //
T02TD1396E:106b-9: dbang thang mi mthun rnyed pa med //
T02TD1396E:106b-10: de rnams mthun par gyur pas na //
T02TD1396E:106b-11: tshe ring nad med dpal 'byor ldan //
T02TD1396E:106b-12: phal pas btang snyoms 'bras gsal min //
T02TD1396E:106b-13: chu dgra rlung la rlung dgra sa //
T02TD1396E:106b-14: sa dgra me la me dgra chu //
T02TD1396E:106b-15: nam mkha' kun grogs mthun pa'o //
T02TD1396E:106b-16: sa bshes chu la chu bshes sa //
T02TD1396E:106b-17: me bshes rlung la rlung bshes me //
T02TD1396E:106b-18: rlung bran chu la me bran sa //
T02TD1396E:106b-19: chu bran me la sa bran rlung //
T02TD1396E:106b-20: dgras gnod bshes kyis phan par byed //
T02TD1396E:106b-21: bran ni tshur phan phar gnod pa'o //
T02TD1396E:106b-22: phal pas gsum char med par 'dod //
T02TD1396E:106b-24: yan lag dpal la rkyen dbang thang //
T02TD1396E:106b-25: gcig pur gyur na de nyid kyis //
T02TD1396E:106b-26: bye brag las ni bzhir shes bya //
T02TD1396E:106b-27: srog mthun tshe ring lus mthun pas //
T02TD1396E:106b-28: nad med dpal mthun dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1396E:106b-29: dbang thang mthun pas longs spyod 'phel //
T02TD1396E:106b-30: mi mthun tshe thung nad mang zhing //
T02TD1396E:106b-31: sems med dpal med longs spyod 'grib //
T02TD1396E:106b-32: phal pas phan dang gnod pa med //
T02TD1396E:106b-33: bran gyis gcig gnod gcig la phan //
T02TD1396E:106b-34: mkha' gnyis dbyings dang ye shes bzang //
T02TD1396E:106b-35: gsum ni dbyer med mchog yin te //
T02TD1396E:106b-36: bzhi pas bshig par byed pa yin //
T02TD1396E:106b-37: rlung gnyis srog rtsol ngan pa ste //
T02TD1396E:106b-38: gsum gyi ye shes bzang por 'gyur //
T02TD1396E:106b-39: me gnyis phan pa yun thung thabs //
T02TD1396E:106b-40: gsum ni sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'khrug / chu gnyis bzang po gsum yang btub //
T02TD1396E:106b-41: bzhi pa thams cad gong dang mtshungs //
T02TD1396E:106b-42: sa gnyis bzang po gsum pa btub //
T02TD1396E:106b-43: bzhi pa bzang po lnga pa spang //
T02TD1396E:106b-44: phan tshun phan gnod stobs las shes //
T02TD1396E:106b-45: stobs mnyam dpal dang dbang thang srog / gsum gyi stobs las phan tshun shes //
T02TD1396E:106b-46: de nyams kun du 'gran par byos //
T02TD1396E:106b-47: phan 'dogs de yi grogs kyis bya //
T02TD1396E:107a-2: tshe dang nad dang dpal dang grogs //
T02TD1396E:107a-3: srog lus dpal dang dbang thong la //
T02TD1396E:107a-4: de dang de yi gnyen pos byed //
T02TD1396E:107a-5: sa ni ser po sa gru bzhi //
T02TD1396E:107a-6: chu ni dkar po chu zlum po //
T02TD1396E:107a-7: me ni dmar po me gru gsum //
T02TD1396E:107a-8: rlung ni sngon po rlung zla gam //
T02TD1396E:107a-9: nam mkha' kun grogs mdog dbyibs bral //
T02TD1396E:107a-10: de nyid gcig tu phan gnod dka' //
T02TD1396E:107a-11: 'byung ba re la las drug ste //
T02TD1396E:107a-12: bsnun dang dbab dang sreg pa dang //
T02TD1396E:107a-13: tshim dang gso dang dgyes pa'o //
T02TD1396E:107a-14: re re 'ang thig les brgyan par bya //
T02TD1396E:107a-15: sgron ma'i ming la mtshon byas na //
T02TD1396E:107a-18: aom rt'a:boo sha ta sreg pa'o //
T02TD1396E:107a-21: aom at'am ba sha ta dgyes pa'o //
T02TD1396E:107a-22: 'byung ba dar dang rgud dang mnyam //
T02TD1396E:107a-23: gsos btab shed smad gnyis gnyis nas //
T02TD1396E:107a-24: re re la yang shes par bya //
T02TD1396E:107a-25: 'byung chung nyi shu rtsa lnga la //
T02TD1396E:107a-26: dbyibs mdog las kyang nyi shu lnga //
T02TD1396E:107a-27: dus phyogs nyon mongs nyi shu lnga //
T02TD1396E:107a-28: spong thob 'dod pas shes par bya //
T02TD1396E:107a-30: 'dzam bu gling sogs dpag med na //
T02TD1396E:107a-31: yi ge grangs dang gog sa dang //
T02TD1396E:107a-32: ming mi 'dra ba gang yod kyang //
T02TD1396E:107a-33: 'byung gnas lnga las byung shes pas //
T02TD1396E:107a-34: de yis sgra rnams thams cad shes //
T02TD1396E:107a-35: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi //
T02TD1396E:107a-36: sngags kyi de nyid mi shes par //
T02TD1396E:107a-37: gang zhig lha sgrub las byed pa //
T02TD1396E:107a-38: nam mkha' bza' bar 'dod dang mtshungs //
T02TD1396E:107a-39: de phyir sngags pa rnams la ni //
T02TD1396E:107a-41: cung zad bdag gis 'dir ni blangs //
T02TD1396E:107a-42: de yang dgyes pa rdo rje las //
T02TD1396E:107a-44: reg pa sra ba sa yi khams //
T02TD1396E:107a-45: gsher ba chu ste dro ba me //
T02TD1396E:107a-46: bskyod pa rlung khams bde nam mkha' //
T02TD1396E:107a-47: lnga yis yongs su bskor ba yin //
T02TD1396E:107a-48: dge slong nyon mongs med pa'o //
T02TD1396E:107a-50: zag pa dri chu khu zad pa'o //
T02TD1396E:107a-52: bral bas dbang gsum ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:107a-53: dbang po thul ba bzhi pa'i dus //
T02TD1396E:107a-54: bde ba rnyed pas mi 'dzag pa'o //
T02TD1396E:107b-0: bsil bar gyur pa chags pa @107b zad ;
T02TD1396E:107b-1: / rnyog pa med ni dangs ma'o //
T02TD1396E:107b-2: de yang 'khor lo sdom pa las //
T02TD1396E:107b-4: gdul bya de rnams shes nas kyang //
T02TD1396E:107b-5: yi ge las byung rnam par spangs //
T02TD1396E:107b-6: tshangs pa nyid du gyur nas phyis //
T02TD1396E:107b-7: nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur pa yin //
T02TD1396E:107b-9: rig pa dang ni gsum skyes sri //
T02TD1396E:107b-10: rkang par shes rab ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:107b-11: ldan pa bzhi pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:107b-12: bde gshegs thig le 'jig rten rig / nyon mongs byang lam rtog pa'i mchog / bdag gir mi 'dzin dga' ba ste //
T02TD1396E:107b-13: las rgya yin no ngar mi 'dzin //
T02TD1396E:107b-14: mchog dga' yi ni chos rgya'o //
T02TD1396E:107b-15: bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas //
T02TD1396E:107b-16: zhes pa lhan skyes dam rgya la //
T02TD1396E:107b-17: 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa //
T02TD1396E:107b-18: dga' bral dga' ba phyag rgya che //
T02TD1396E:107b-19: bya ba byas pas skam sar gnas //
T02TD1396E:107b-20: rim gyis bzhi par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1396E:107b-21: shes pa 'ba' zhig chos rnams te //
T02TD1396E:107b-22: nges gsal lhan skyes ye shes rtogs //
T02TD1396E:107b-23: shes rab mtshon cha stong nyid kyis //
T02TD1396E:107b-24: nyon mongs nye nyon rnams 'joms pa'o //
T02TD1396E:107b-25: dam pa bla ma rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD1396E:107b-26: chos ni brgyad khri bzhi stong la //
T02TD1396E:107b-27: chos rgyal ae bam chos kun dang //
T02TD1396E:107b-28: sangs rgyas kun gyi pha ma'o //
T02TD1396E:107b-29: gsal bar k'a li ldan pa aa //
T02TD1396E:107b-30: de las chos rnams thams cad skyes //
T02TD1396E:107b-31: de yang mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las //
T02TD1396E:107b-32: a'a li k'a li ma gtogs par //
T02TD1396E:107b-33: gal te rdo rje'i chos 'dod pa //
T02TD1396E:107b-35: phub ma rdung dang byed dang mtshungs //
T02TD1396E:107b-37: 'jig rten ma rtogs log rtogs so //
T02TD1396E:107b-38: snang bar zhes pa'i de nyid mthong //
T02TD1396E:107b-39: mchog ni lhan skyes ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:107b-40: chos kyi dbang phyug ham las ni //
T02TD1396E:107b-41: rang byin rlob pa chos kyi rgyal //
T02TD1396E:107b-42: legs pa'i lam ni chags bcas pa //
T02TD1396E:107b-43: spyod lam mi spyod snon pa'o //
T02TD1396E:107b-44: don grub mchog tu mi 'gyur thob //
T02TD1396E:107b-45: bsam pa grub pa ste zhes pa //
T02TD1396E:107b-46: las rgya sdug bsngal snod yin pas //
T02TD1396E:107b-47: spangs te ye shes phyag rgya las //
T02TD1396E:107b-48: rdo rje sems dpa' mngon byed pa'o //
T02TD1396E:107b-49: kun du rtog pa mi mo la //
T02TD1396E:107b-50: brten pa'i bde ba thams cad spang //
T02TD1396E:108a-0: rnam par mi rtog yan lag drug / phag mo bdag med ma @108a * //
T02TD1396E:108a-2: dbyings mi zad pa'i ye shes thob //
T02TD1396E:108a-5: rnam par rtog pa gang gang gis //
T02TD1396E:108a-6: dngos po gang la gang rtog pa //
T02TD1396E:108a-7: de nyid kun du brtags pa yi //
T02TD1396E:108a-8: ngo bo nyid med de med do //
T02TD1396E:108a-11: zhe na chos dbyings dam pa la //
T02TD1396E:108a-12: zad mi shes pa'i thabs yod pas //
T02TD1396E:108a-13: blo ngan rnams la bstan pa yin //
T02TD1396E:108a-14: de yang klu las khros pa las //
T02TD1396E:108a-15: zhi bas phan par ma gyur na //
T02TD1396E:108a-16: de bzhin gshegs nyid khro bor sprul //
T02TD1396E:108a-17: ji ltar ji ltar btul gyur pa //
T02TD1396E:108a-18: 'di yi byed pa rdo rje sems //
T02TD1396E:108a-20: bsod nams snying rje chen po la //
T02TD1396E:108a-21: ldan pa chags pa'i blun pa'o //
T02TD1396E:108a-22: bsod nams mi 'dzag bde ba'i sems //
T02TD1396E:108a-23: tshogs ni phyag rgya chen po'i thabs //
T02TD1396E:108a-25: lus la ye shes chen por gnas //
T02TD1396E:108a-27: de rtogs thabs ni bsod ye shes //
T02TD1396E:108a-28: yin par kun mthun thabs mi mkhas //
T02TD1396E:108a-29: bsod nams phyir bsog ye shes ni //
T02TD1396E:108a-30: blo yis byas pas thar pa ring //
T02TD1396E:108a-32: bcud rnams kyis mchod mnyes 'phel bas //
T02TD1396E:108a-33: bde stong rgyas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1396E:108a-35: ye shes tshogs rnams de nyid do //
T02TD1396E:108a-36: des na rgyud rnams kun las kyang //
T02TD1396E:108a-37: dka' thub dka' spyad 'dir mi dgos //
T02TD1396E:108a-38: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la //
T02TD1396E:108a-39: ci bde bar ni spyad pas 'grub //
T02TD1396E:108a-41: ye shes nor bu dmigs med bde //
T02TD1396E:108a-42: ye shes ham skyes thig le'i khams //
T02TD1396E:108a-43: 'byung gnas che ni de nyid do //
T02TD1396E:108a-44: de yang rgyud las 'di skad gsungs //
T02TD1396E:108a-45: rlung bcings pa yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1396E:108a-46: rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsreg / rtog med ye shes la sbyor ba //
T02TD1396E:108a-47: lus kyi thabs la brten pa mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02TD1396E:108a-48: rang la ye shes ldan pa yis //
T02TD1396E:108a-49: yod mi shes pa 'di yin te /
T02TD1396E:108a-50: pha rol ye shes yod med shes //
T02TD1396E:108a-51: yang na mtha' bral rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:108a-52: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o //
T02TD1396E:108a-53: zhes pa ba spu'i bu gnas //
T02TD1396E:108a-54: sprul pa sprul te 'gro don nus //
T02TD1396E:108b-1: med par dka' thub zas spong sogs //
T02TD1396E:108b-2: rgya mtsho rus sbal khog gshog 'dra //
T02TD1396E:108b-3: rtag pa mi nyams kun rgyal ba //
T02TD1396E:108b-4: rtsa stong prag [*phrag] ni bdun cu gnyis //
T02TD1396E:108b-5: bde chen rang bzhin rgyas pa ste //
T02TD1396E:108b-6: rnal 'byor can ni sgo gsum dag / de yang lus las gsungs pa ni //
T02TD1396E:108b-7: ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa //
T02TD1396E:108b-8: rnal 'byor zhes ni de bshad do //
T02TD1396E:108b-10: bsam gtan dga' bzhi bsam bya ni //
T02TD1396E:108b-11: rlung dang rtsa rnams dran pa'o //
T02TD1396E:108b-12: yang na snying ga padma'i gnas //
T02TD1396E:108b-13: cha med dran pa blo ldan mchog / so sor rang rig mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1396E:108b-14: zhes pa gzhon nu sa ha dz'as //
T02TD1396E:108b-15: rig la smra bar ma nus pa'o //
T02TD1396E:108b-16: mchog gi dang po lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1396E:108b-17: sku gsum 'chang ba rdo rje sems //
T02TD1396E:108b-18: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1396E:108b-19: zhes pa ma log log pa dang //
T02TD1396E:108b-20: rmi lam rmi lam chen po dang //
T02TD1396E:108b-21: sad pa gnas skabs lnga po ni //
T02TD1396E:108b-22: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1396E:108b-23: khyab bdag lhan cig skyes pa la //
T02TD1396E:108b-24: ye shes lnga ni gnas skabs lnga //
T02TD1396E:108b-25: ye shes dag dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1396E:108b-26: de yang he yi rdo rje las //
T02TD1396E:108b-28: zhes pa 'di du sbyor ba yin //
T02TD1396E:108b-29: sangs rgyas lnga bdag rigs lnga la //
T02TD1396E:108b-30: cod pan lnga phung dag rtags su //
T02TD1396E:108b-32: spyan lnga mtshan mo'i rtags lnga la //
T02TD1396E:108b-33: bltas pas chags pa med pa 'chang //
T02TD1396E:108b-34: de yang dra ba sdom pa las //
T02TD1396E:108b-35: dang po ri dags srid du snang ba ste //
T02TD1396E:108b-36: mtshan ma gnyis pa dud kha'i rnam pa can //
T02TD1396E:108b-37: gsum pa me khyer dang 'dra bzhi pa ni //
T02TD1396E:108b-38: sbyin med nam mkha' mtshan ma lnga pa ni //
T02TD1396E:108b-39: shin tu 'od gsal rang gi snang ba 'char //
T02TD1396E:108b-41: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'o //
T02TD1396E:108b-42: zhes pa sprul longs sogs mthong la //
T02TD1396E:108b-43: nyin mo'i rtags mthong mngon shes drug / sangs rgyas sras po byang chub sems //
T02TD1396E:108b-44: dam pa'i mchog ni bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1396E:108b-46: skye gnas med ni rdzogs pa'i rim //
T02TD1396E:108b-48: bskyed pa'i rim la rab gnas shing //
T02TD1396E:108b-49: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom byed pa //
T02TD1396E:108b-50: sangs rgyas thabs dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1396E:108b-51: skas kyi sen mo bzhin du bshad //
T02TD1396E:109a-2: bam gzhag pa yi srid pa sel //
T02TD1396E:109a-3: gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag / ces pa lhan skyes ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:109a-4: dngos de skyes ma thag tu ni //
T02TD1396E:109a-5: kun gyi don grub 'gro ba'i bdag / smin cing 'khrul 'khor ldan pa yis //
T02TD1396E:109a-6: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
T02TD1396E:109a-7: rtags brgyad mthong ba 'di lta ste //
T02TD1396E:109a-8: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
T02TD1396E:109a-9: rang sems 'bar ba'i rnam pa can //
T02TD1396E:109a-10: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02TD1396E:109a-12: zla ba'i ye shes rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1396E:109a-13: ye shes snang ba lam me ba //
T02TD1396E:109a-14: nyi ma'i ye shes rin chen 'byung ;
T02TD1396E:109a-15: /'gro ba'i ye shes mar me sgron //
T02TD1396E:109a-16: r'a hu ye shes don yod grub //
T02TD1396E:109a-17: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1396E:109a-18: glog gi ye shes mtha' yas nyid //
T02TD1396E:109a-19: sngags drag mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal //
T02TD1396E:109a-20: thig le gnas ba'i ye shes te //
T02TD1396E:109a-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1396E:109a-22: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
T02TD1396E:109a-23: zla sngon snang ba'i ye shes ni //
T02TD1396E:109a-24: he ru ka dpal nyid du 'dod //
T02TD1396E:109a-25: gtsug tor chen po'i lta stangs kyis //
T02TD1396E:109a-26: re kh'a nag po ye shes mthong //
T02TD1396E:109a-27: dus kyi 'khor lo thod pa can //
T02TD1396E:109a-29: thams cad mthong ba mchog thob pa'o //
T02TD1396E:109a-30: nam mkha'i bdag po ta ra na //
T02TD1396E:109a-31: sna tshogs ston pa yon tan no //
T02TD1396E:109a-32: de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas las //
T02TD1396E:109a-33: ta ra na bcings yon tan gyis //
T02TD1396E:109a-34: srid pa gsum po ma g-yos pas //
T02TD1396E:109a-35: nam mkha'i bdag por de gyur te //
T02TD1396E:109a-36: rtags bcu la sogs sna tshogs ston //
T02TD1396E:109a-38: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po ni //
T02TD1396E:109a-39: rtags rnams snang bas dngos po mchog / de 'dra mthong ba'i rnal 'byor te //
T02TD1396E:109a-40: kun dga' chen po mig dang ldan //
T02TD1396E:109a-41: ldan chos lta stangs bzhi yin te //
T02TD1396E:109a-42: sna tshogs gzugs can rtags mtshan rnams //
T02TD1396E:109a-43: byed pa po ni yan lag drug ;
T02TD1396E:109a-44: / mchod cing brjod pa bsnyen sgrub bzhi //
T02TD1396E:109a-45: drang srong chen po bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1396E:109a-46: rigs gsum gnas dang zhing ye shes //
T02TD1396E:109a-47: 'chang ba de la bde ba yod //
T02TD1396E:109a-49: thig le mi nyams gsang sngags 'dzin //
T02TD1396E:109a-50: dam tshig chen po rtag tu bde //
T02TD1396E:109b-0: @109b gtso bo rtsa gsum dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD1396E:109b-2: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po //
T02TD1396E:109b-3: zhes pa lhan skyes ye shes rten //
T02TD1396E:109b-4: skal ba dang ni khyogs gdugs so //
T02TD1396E:109b-5: don yod thig le zhags pa ni //
T02TD1396E:109b-6: rlung gis 'bigs pas rnam par rgyal //
T02TD1396E:109b-8: rlung 'gog chen po rdo rje zhags //
T02TD1396E:109b-9: rlung gis de blangs rdo rje yi //
T02TD1396E:109b-10: lcags kyu zhags pa che zhes bya //
T02TD1396E:109b-11: yang na zhags pa che zhes pa //
T02TD1396E:109b-13: nor rgyas ming can rlung de yis //
T02TD1396E:109b-15: de la zhags pa zhes brjod do //
T02TD1396E:109b-16: lus ni yul chen nyi shu bzhi //
T02TD1396E:109b-17: dpral ba la sogs sbyar ba dang //
T02TD1396E:109b-19: gnas gtso yin te rtsa lnga yi //
T02TD1396E:109b-20: tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lnga dag / rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rgya cher 'grel pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o /
T02TD1396E:109b-23: // / le'u bdun pa rdo rje'i rigs tshigs su bcad pa bcu dang gcig / dang po rdo rje 'jigs byed ni //
T02TD1396E:109b-24: rdo rje aa wa dh'u t'a la //
T02TD1396E:109b-25: de nang rlung ni 'jigs byed do //
T02TD1396E:109b-26: 'jigs par byed ni de rtog bshigs //
T02TD1396E:109b-27: khro bo'i rgyal po dga' bral mtha' //
T02TD1396E:109b-28: so sor sdud sogs gdeng drug la //
T02TD1396E:109b-29: 'jigs pa des ni rtog pa gcod //
T02TD1396E:109b-30: mig drug mngon shes lag drug rtags //
T02TD1396E:109b-31: stobs dang ldan ni 'dod chags kyis //
T02TD1396E:109b-33: keng rus spyi bo'i ham dkar po //
T02TD1396E:109b-34: mche ba aa shad gtsigs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:109b-35: bla ma'i gdams pas gtum mo sbyor //
T02TD1396E:109b-36: ha la ha la mkha' ye shes //
T02TD1396E:109b-37: gdong brgya rtsa rlung stong pa yis //
T02TD1396E:109b-39: gshin rje gnyis med ye shes te //
T02TD1396E:109b-40: gshed po de yis gnyis snang 'joms //
T02TD1396E:109b-41: bgegs kyi rgyal ni bdud bzhi rgyal //
T02TD1396E:109b-42: rdo rje yang dag ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:109b-43: shugs chen zhes pas 'jigs par byed //
T02TD1396E:109b-44: rdo rje drag po lus ngag yid //
T02TD1396E:109b-45: gsang ba 'dus sogs las gsungs so //
T02TD1396E:109b-46: rdo rje snying po chos kyi tshul //
T02TD1396E:109b-47: sgyu 'phrul m'a y'a ae dang wam //
T02TD1396E:109b-48: rdo rje lingga gsus po che //
T02TD1396E:109b-49: rgyas shing shin tu rgyas pa'o //
T02TD1396E:109b-50: rdo rje las skyes rdor bum nang //
T02TD1396E:109b-51: dz'a landha ra dbu rgyan par //
T02TD1396E:110a-0: bde bas gang la rdo rje'i @110a * //
T02TD1396E:110a-2: / rdo rje snying pos sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1396E:110a-3: mkha' 'dra gsang gnas las skyes bde //
T02TD1396E:110a-4: mi g-yo srog rtsol gnas pa la //
T02TD1396E:110a-5: ral pa gcig pa ro gcig grol //
T02TD1396E:110a-6: bsgyings pa de 'dra gang yod pa'o //
T02TD1396E:110a-7: glang chen bde ba ko rlon no //
T02TD1396E:110a-8: lus kun khyab cing mnyes par byas //
T02TD1396E:110a-9: de ldan pas na gos su gyon //
T02TD1396E:110a-10: grags chen bde bas gang ba la //
T02TD1396E:110a-11: ha ha zhes sgrogs dpa' bo'i gang //
T02TD1396E:110a-12: hi hi zhes sgrogs dpa' mo'i gad //
T02TD1396E:110a-13: 'jigs par byed pa mngon bde myong //
T02TD1396E:110a-14: gad mo chen po bde chen thig / gad rgyangs can ni ltung ba'i sgra //
T02TD1396E:110a-15: ha brgyad brjod pa rdo rje'i gad //
T02TD1396E:110a-16: cher sgrogs pa ni rgyun chad med //
T02TD1396E:110a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub sems //
T02TD1396E:110a-18: sems dpa' chen po dbyer med bde //
T02TD1396E:110a-19: rdo rje la rgyal po ni //
T02TD1396E:110a-20: de yi nang nas bde ba che //
T02TD1396E:110a-21: rdo rje drag po stong pa nyid //
T02TD1396E:110a-22: rtag tu de ldan dga' ba che //
T02TD1396E:110a-24: zhes pa h'um bzhis gnas bzhir ni //
T02TD1396E:110a-25: dga' bzhi nyams su myong ba'o //
T02TD1396E:110a-26: rdo rje aa wa dh'u t'i la //
T02TD1396E:110a-27: mda' thogs pa ni mtshon cha can //
T02TD1396E:110a-28: g-yas g-yon gnyis kyi rlung 'gags pa //
T02TD1396E:110a-29: mtshon chen de yis rnam rtog gcod //
T02TD1396E:110a-30: rdo rje gnyis med ye shes kyi //
T02TD1396E:110a-31: ral gris nyon mongs ma lus gcod //
T02TD1396E:110a-32: rdo rje rlung rnams kun 'chang ba ;
T02TD1396E:110a-33: / sna yi rtse mor yungs 'bru bsgom //
T02TD1396E:110a-34: de nyid nor bu rdo rje can //
T02TD1396E:110a-35: de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las //
T02TD1396E:110a-36: sna rtser yungs kar zhes brjod pa //
T02TD1396E:110a-37: de yang srog dang rtsol bar brjod //
T02TD1396E:110a-38: khams gsum pa ni ma lus la //
T02TD1396E:110a-39: srid gsum gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1396E:110a-41: rdo rje gcig pu las rgyal //
T02TD1396E:110a-42: de bsten bde bas g-yul sel ba'o //
T02TD1396E:110a-44: mig mi bzang ni ri dags mig / spyi bor rdo rje 'bar ba ste //
T02TD1396E:110a-45: zhes pa yar rtse mar rtse 'bar //
T02TD1396E:110a-46: rdo rje 'bebs pa bcu drug la //
T02TD1396E:110a-47: de yi phyed phyed 'bebs pa che //
T02TD1396E:110a-48: khams gsum phyag rgya chen por dbang //
T02TD1396E:110a-49: mig brgya pa ste mngal bya //
T02TD1396E:110a-50: rdo rje'i mig ni sha yi spyan //
T02TD1396E:110a-51: de yis gzugs brnyan mthong ba'o //
T02TD1396E:110a-52: lus ni rdo rje'i pa spu can //
T02TD1396E:110a-53: zhes pa spu bye phyed bzhi //
T02TD1396E:110a-55: de nyid rdo rje'i spu yin te //
T02TD1396E:110a-56: gcig pu lus ni rgyun chad med //
T02TD1396E:110b-0: sen mo dkar dmar @110b 'dres pa las //
T02TD1396E:110b-1: skyes pa bde stong rdo rje'i rtse //
T02TD1396E:110b-2: mi 'dzag rtag tu dga' ba'i yid //
T02TD1396E:110b-3: rdo rje snying po rnam rtog med //
T02TD1396E:110b-4: bags pa mkhregs ni skyon mi tshugs //
T02TD1396E:110b-5: rdo rje phreng 'dzin yul rtsa bzhir //
T02TD1396E:110b-6: thim dang longs spyod 'jug pa gsum //
T02TD1396E:110b-7: nyin mtshan dus 'das dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1396E:110b-8: de 'dra'i byed gsum rdo rje rgyan //
T02TD1396E:110b-9: rnal 'byor lus la brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1396E:110b-10: kun la bde ba'i gad rgyangs ni //
T02TD1396E:110b-11: dga' chen ha ha nges par sgrogs //
T02TD1396E:110b-12: yi ge drug pa 'khor lo drug / rdo rje'i sgra ni aa ksha ra'o //
T02TD1396E:110b-14: 'jam dbyangs thig le chen po la //
T02TD1396E:110b-15: de ni mi 'phro sgra che ba ;
T02TD1396E:110b-16: /'jigs rten gsum na sgra gcig pa //
T02TD1396E:110b-17: zhes pa zag pa dgra gcig pu //
T02TD1396E:110b-18: de 'dul thabs chen stong gsum gyi //
T02TD1396E:110b-19: nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:110b-20: sgra dang ldan pa theg chen chos //
T02TD1396E:110b-21: sna tshogs thabs lam bstan pa las //
T02TD1396E:110b-22: rnams kyi mchog gyur 'di nyid do //
T02TD1396E:110b-23: snying ga'i phyi yi rtsa bdun dang //
T02TD1396E:110b-24: 'og gi rtsa bzhi dri chen dang //
T02TD1396E:110b-25: dri chu khrag dang khu ba 'bab //
T02TD1396E:110b-26: bcu gcig dag pa shlo ka / bcu dang tshig rkang gcig dag pa'o //
T02TD1396E:110b-27: rdo rje rigs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u bdun pa'o /
T02TD1396E:110b-31: / tshigs brgyad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis //
T02TD1396E:110b-32: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes bstan //
T02TD1396E:110b-33: de bzhin nyid ni dh'u t'i'o //
T02TD1396E:110b-34: yang dag bdag med g-yas g-yon rlung //
T02TD1396E:110b-35: yang dag mtha' ste rlung grub pa //
T02TD1396E:110b-36: yi ge med ni ram rtog med //
T02TD1396E:110b-37: stong gnyis mi 'dzag gang ba'i sems //
T02TD1396E:110b-38: smra ba a'a li k'a li la //
T02TD1396E:110b-39: khyu mchog bdud rnams 'joms pa ste //
T02TD1396E:110b-40: zab cing stong nyid rgya chen snang //
T02TD1396E:110b-41: dbyer med dbyer med sgra sgrogs pa //
T02TD1396E:110b-42: chos kyi dung ste chos 'byung na //
T02TD1396E:110b-43: rtsa ni bde skyed dung can ma //
T02TD1396E:110b-44: bde ba dpag med sgra chen ldan //
T02TD1396E:110b-45: chos kyi gandi mgrin par gnas //
T02TD1396E:110b-46: brgyad khri bzhi stong chos stong pa //
T02TD1396E:110b-47: sgra bo che ni gsung rdo rje //
T02TD1396E:110b-48: mi gnas phyag rgya chen po la //
T02TD1396E:110b-50: phyogs bcu yul dang yul can te //
T02TD1396E:110b-51: chos kyi rnga chen rtsa rlung phub //
T02TD1396E:110b-52: gzugs med chos sku stong pa nyid //
T02TD1396E:110b-53: gzugs bzang longs sku bde ba che //
T02TD1396E:111a-2: sna tshogs gzugs can sprul sku'o //
T02TD1396E:111a-3: yid ni bde chen spros bral las //
T02TD1396E:111a-4: skyes pa sku lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1396E:111a-5: gzugs rnams rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba la //
T02TD1396E:111a-6: thams cad rten dang brten bcas la //
T02TD1396E:111a-7: brten nas sku bzhi'i snang ba'i dbal //
T02TD1396E:111a-8: gzugs brnyan nyin mtshan rtags bcu bzhi //
T02TD1396E:111a-10: mtshungs pa med ni 'dod yon lngas //
T02TD1396E:111a-11: mi gnod 'phel zhing cher grags pa //
T02TD1396E:111a-12: khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste //
T02TD1396E:111a-13: bsod nams ye shes tshogs mthar phyin //
T02TD1396E:111a-14: lam dang 'bras bu gnyis yin no //
T02TD1396E:111a-16: lam ni 'khor lo drug yin no //
T02TD1396E:111a-17: shin tu mtho ba gtsug tor la //
T02TD1396E:111a-18: thig le mi nyams gnas pa'o //
T02TD1396E:111a-19: chos kyi rtog ni rdo rje rtser //
T02TD1396E:111a-20: rgyas pa po ni bde bas gang //
T02TD1396E:111a-21: 'jig rten gsum ni lus ngag yid //
T02TD1396E:111a-22: gzhon lus gcig ni gsum pa'i dus //
T02TD1396E:111a-23: gnas brtan sprul pa'i 'khor lo la //
T02TD1396E:111a-24: rgan po lhan skyes ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:111a-25: skye dgu'i bdag ni bug dgu bsdams //
T02TD1396E:111a-26: de yang sgyu ma chen mo las //
T02TD1396E:111a-27: mig gnyis dang ni rna ba gnyis //
T02TD1396E:111a-28: de bzhin sna dang kha dag dang //
T02TD1396E:111a-29: yid kyi snying po dgag pa ni //
T02TD1396E:111a-30: seng ge rnam grol phyag rgya che //
T02TD1396E:111a-31: rnal 'byor pa yis bcing bar bya //
T02TD1396E:111a-33: de las skyes pa'i bde ba'o //
T02TD1396E:111a-34: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //
T02TD1396E:111a-36: sdu gu gtum mo'i na chung la //
T02TD1396E:111a-38: /'jig rten mig la sogs pa la //
T02TD1396E:111a-39: shes legs skyon gyis ma gos par //
T02TD1396E:111a-40: ston pa slob dpon zhes brjod do //
T02TD1396E:111a-42: slob dpon bzhi pa ster ba ste //
T02TD1396E:111a-43: de la 'jigs pa med pa mchog / gnyis med spyor ba mgon skyob pa //
T02TD1396E:111a-44: 'jig rten yid gcugs don dam dang //
T02TD1396E:111a-45: kun rdzob phan tshun mi 'gal ba'o /
T02TD1396E:111a-46: skyabs dang 'bab pa skyob pa ni //
T02TD1396E:111a-47: bzlog pas ye shes bla na med //
T02TD1396E:111a-48: nam mkha'i mtha' ni shes rab la //
T02TD1396E:111a-49: longs spyod pa ni gnyis med spyor //
T02TD1396E:111a-50: thams cad mkhyen pa spyor drug gis //
T02TD1396E:111b-0: rtags ma lus pa thob pa @111b las ;
T02TD1396E:111b-1: / ye shes mtsho ni zad mi shes //
T02TD1396E:111b-2: yon tan chen pos gang ba'o //
T02TD1396E:111b-3: ma rig rten 'brel bcu gnyis la //
T02TD1396E:111b-4: sgo nga'i sbubs ni mi shes gtums //
T02TD1396E:111b-5: 'byed pa gsum pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:111b-6: yang na lus la sangs rgyas ni //
T02TD1396E:111b-7: yod pa ma rtogs sgo nga'i sbubs //
T02TD1396E:111b-8: 'byed pa bla mas ye shes sbyor //
T02TD1396E:111b-9: 'di de lam mchog yin par gsungs //
T02TD1396E:111b-10: srid pa'i dra ba mi shes bsgribs //
T02TD1396E:111b-12: nyon mongs rtsa ba nye nyon mongs //
T02TD1396E:111b-13: ma lus bzhi byed dga' ba bzhi //
T02TD1396E:111b-14: dbang bzhi las rnyed ye shes bzhi'o //
T02TD1396E:111b-15: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgya ste //
T02TD1396E:111b-16: pha rol phyin pa ye shes rgya //
T02TD1396E:111b-17: rgya gram gnyis med bde chen po //
T02TD1396E:111b-18: mchog tu mi 'gyur gang rnyed pa //
