T02TD1396E:111b-19: de ni ye shes dbang bskur te //
T02TD1396E:111b-20: cod pan can ni gtsug tor smin //
T02TD1396E:111b-21: rdzogs pa rdo rje nor bu rtse //
T02TD1396E:111b-22: sangs rgyas bde chen nyams pa med //
T02TD1396E:111b-23: rgyan du thogs ni bde chen du //
T02TD1396E:111b-24: ye shes lnga ldan dbu rgyan no //
T02TD1396E:111b-25: gsung ni lus ngag yid gsum la //
T02TD1396E:111b-26: sdug bsngal srog rtsol 'tshe bsregs myags //
T02TD1396E:111b-27: sdug bsngal zhi ni rtog rlung 'gags //
T02TD1396E:111b-28: gsum sel dug gsum sel ba'o //
T02TD1396E:111b-29: mtha' yas lhan cig skyes dga' ba //
T02TD1396E:111b-30: grol gsum thob ni sku gsum mo ;
T02TD1396E:111b-31: / sgrib pas chu me rlung mkha' //
T02TD1396E:111b-32: rags phra rab phra don spyi dang //
T02TD1396E:111b-33: sems dpa' dang ni bcu pa'o //
T02TD1396E:111b-34: kun las nges par grol ba ni //
T02TD1396E:111b-35: du ba la sogs bcu thob pa'o //
T02TD1396E:111b-36: de dus tsam na nam mkha' ltar //
T02TD1396E:111b-37: lhan skyes mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
T02TD1396E:111b-38: nyon mongs dri ma gong gi bcu //
T02TD1396E:111b-39: kun las 'das pa mthar phyin pa'o //
T02TD1396E:111b-40: de yi dus na lhan skyes ngor //
T02TD1396E:111b-41: dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:111b-42: de nyid phyag rgya chen por 'dod //
T02TD1396E:111b-43: sems can kun gyi sbang bya la //
T02TD1396E:111b-44: klu chen po ni gnyen po ste //
T02TD1396E:111b-45: dga' bzhi reg drug la sogs pa //
T02TD1396E:111b-46: 'dod sogs pham byas klu chen po //
T02TD1396E:111b-47: yon tan theg pa chen po la //
T02TD1396E:111b-48: thod can rnams ni gsang sngags te //
T02TD1396E:111b-49: thod ces de thod 'di yin no //
T02TD1396E:111b-50: nyon mongs kun las zhes pa ni //
T02TD1396E:111b-52: rnam par grol ni bde chen rtogs //
T02TD1396E:111b-53: rtsol ba med par ngang gis grol //
T02TD1396E:112a-2: mkha' ltar mtha' med bder gnas pa //
T02TD1396E:112a-3: de nyid yid bzhin nor bu che //
T02TD1396E:112a-5: rin chen zag med bde ba ste //
T02TD1396E:112a-6: kun mchog phyag rgya chen po la //
T02TD1396E:112a-7: khyab pa'i bdag ni brtan g-yo la'o //
T02TD1396E:112a-8: dpag bsam shing chen dh'u t'i la //
T02TD1396E:112a-9: rgyas pa rtsa rnams kun du ni //
T02TD1396E:112a-10: rlung dang thig les khyab pa'o //
T02TD1396E:112a-11: bum pa bzang po nor bu la //
T02TD1396E:112a-12: che ba'i mchog ni mi 'dzag bde //
T02TD1396E:112a-13: de yi byed pa ci zhe na //
T02TD1396E:112a-14: sems can gdul bya la dgongs nas //
T02TD1396E:112a-15: kun don byed pa bde 'phel ba'o //
T02TD1396E:112a-16: phan 'dogs yon tan brgyad thob pas //
T02TD1396E:112a-17: sems can phan pas mnyes gshin pa //
T02TD1396E:112a-18: bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la //
T02TD1396E:112a-19: zhes pa phyi rol de bzhin nang //
T02TD1396E:112a-20: phyi rol rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyis //
T02TD1396E:112a-21: skye dang las dang phyogs ngan dang //
T02TD1396E:112a-22: g-yo dang rkun po don rnams dang //
T02TD1396E:112a-23: ltas dang tshe tshad nad rnams dang ;
T02TD1396E:112a-24: / kun gyi bya ba shes par 'gyur //
T02TD1396E:112a-25: nang du g-yas g-yon dkyil 'khor lnga //
T02TD1396E:112a-26: phyi nang don rnams grub pa'o //
T02TD1396E:112a-27: gzhan yang chu srin bum pa nya //
T02TD1396E:112a-28: lug dang khyu mchog me thun //
T02TD1396E:112a-29: karka seng ge bu mo srang //
T02TD1396E:112a-30: sdig pa gzhu 'dzin bcu gnyis kyis //
T02TD1396E:112a-31: nyi ma zla ba shes pa'o //
T02TD1396E:112a-32: de yi rang 'byung la sogs shing //
T02TD1396E:112a-33: dam shes lus ngag ye shes shes //
T02TD1396E:112a-34: dam ldan shes rab ma la ni //
T02TD1396E:112a-35: brtse dang shugs dang drud pa dang //
T02TD1396E:112a-36: mi 'dzag bde ba dam tshig bzhis //
T02TD1396E:112a-37: lus sems kun du khyab pa'i bdag / bdud rtsi 'byung ba las gsungs pa //
T02TD1396E:112a-38: mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar rgyug pa'i //
T02TD1396E:112a-39: rab tu rgyug cing 'pho ba'i sems //
T02TD1396E:112a-40: rnam rtog yul la 'dzag pa'i sems //
T02TD1396E:112a-41: bde bar gzung bar the tshom med //
T02TD1396E:112a-43: sems can dbang shes rab 'bring bzhis //
T02TD1396E:112a-44: dus shes de la dbang bzhi ster //
T02TD1396E:112a-45: bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pas shes ;
T02TD1396E:112a-46: / rnam grol gsum dam las ye shes //
T02TD1396E:112a-47: mkhas pa po ni sa 'og sogs //
T02TD1396E:112a-48: dbang thob nas ni yon tan gyis //
T02TD1396E:112a-49: snying stobs rdul dang mun pa rnams //
T02TD1396E:112a-50: ldan zhing de la ye shes ldan //
T02TD1396E:112a-51: yon tan ye shes de la brjod //
T02TD1396E:112a-52: chos shes bkra shis 'jig rten bde //
T02TD1396E:112b-1: bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
T02TD1396E:112b-2: dga' ba rnam bcu drug po //
T02TD1396E:112b-3: nyams su myong bas grags pa yis //
T02TD1396E:112b-4: bkra shis snyan grags dge ba thob //
T02TD1396E:112b-5: chags sogs ma spangs dbugs 'byin che //
T02TD1396E:112b-6: tshim par byed pa dga' ston che //
T02TD1396E:112b-7: dga' chen lhan skyes rol pa ni //
T02TD1396E:112b-8: mig 'phrul lta bu'i snang ba la //
T02TD1396E:112b-9: chen po don dam phyag rgya che //
T02TD1396E:112b-10: bkur sti lus las rtsol ba byed //
T02TD1396E:112b-11: rim gro rlung las legs sbyor ba //
T02TD1396E:112b-12: phun sum tshogs pa yon tan thob //
T02TD1396E:112b-13: mchog tu dga' ba 'jig rten las //
T02TD1396E:112b-14: grags bdag dpal ni lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1396E:112b-15: mchog ldan lhan skyes yod pa las //
T02TD1396E:112b-16: mchog sbyin bzhi pa'i gtso bo ste //
T02TD1396E:112b-17: de nyid skyabs kyi dam pa dang //
T02TD1396E:112b-18: gnyen por che bas skyabs su 'os //
T02TD1396E:112b-19: 'jig rten dgra ni dug gsum ste //
T02TD1396E:112b-20: rab kyi mchog ni bde stong ngo //
T02TD1396E:112b-21: de yis 'jigs pa ma lus pa //
T02TD1396E:112b-22: shin tu med pas sel ba'o //
T02TD1396E:112b-23: gtsug phud 'khor ba'i bde ba la //
T02TD1396E:112b-24: phud pu dbang gis rab tu bcings //
T02TD1396E:112b-25: lcang lo can ni gzhan don du //
T02TD1396E:112b-27: ral pa gnyis su med par sdom //
T02TD1396E:112b-28: len tshar cod pan thogs ldan pa'o //
T02TD1396E:112b-29: gdong lnga ye shes lnga yin te //
T02TD1396E:112b-30: gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa ni /
T02TD1396E:112b-31: rigs lnga dag dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1396E:112b-32: gnas skabs lnga po me tog thogs //
T02TD1396E:112b-33: zhes pa gnas skabs lnga po ni //
T02TD1396E:112b-34: ma log log dang rmi lam dang //
T02TD1396E:112b-35: rmi lam che dang sad pa'o //
T02TD1396E:112b-36: me tog thogs pa rdzas 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1396E:112b-37: mgo zlum kha khra mu kha la //
T02TD1396E:112b-38: brtul zhugs rnyed dang ma rnyed pa //
T02TD1396E:112b-39: bde ba chen po 'dzin pa ni //
T02TD1396E:112b-40: tshangs par spyod pa mi nyams pa //
T02TD1396E:112b-41: brtul zhugs mchog kyang de nyid do //
T02TD1396E:112b-42: dka' thub nyan thos mthar thug pa //
T02TD1396E:112b-43: pha rol phyin pa dka' thub che //
T02TD1396E:112b-44: rdo rje'i theg pa nyid yin te //
T02TD1396E:112b-45: de nyid gsal ba'i rgyud las su //
T02TD1396E:112b-46: kha chu tsam zhig zags pa na //
T02TD1396E:112b-48: bsgral te khrag ni 'thung bar byed //
T02TD1396E:112b-49: dmyal ba zhes pa'ang de las 'gyur //
T02TD1396E:112b-51: gtsang gnas dam pa skyon med pa //
T02TD1396E:112b-52: goo ta ma rigs ma nyams //
T02TD1396E:112b-53: bram ze tshangs pa rig byed yin //
T02TD1396E:112b-54: snyan dang gas srid srung nges brjod dang //
T02TD1396E:113a-2: mya ngan 'das ni don dam pa //
T02TD1396E:113a-3: tshangs pa bral ba thob pa'o //
T02TD1396E:113a-4: grol ba stong ba thar ba ni //
T02TD1396E:113a-5: bde chen spros bral rnam grol lus //
T02TD1396E:113a-6: rnam grol phyag rgya chen po la //
T02TD1396E:113a-7: zhi ba zhi ba dga' bzhi nyid //
T02TD1396E:113a-8: de yang he yi rdo rje las //
T02TD1396E:113a-9: ji ltar me yis tshig pa la //
T02TD1396E:113a-10: me de nyid kyis bdugs te 'tsho //
T02TD1396E:113a-11: 'dod chags me yes tshig pa la //
T02TD1396E:113a-12: 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol byed //
T02TD1396E:113a-14: mya ngan 'das pa chos kyi sku //
T02TD1396E:113a-15: mya ngan 'grel ni gzugs kyi sku //
T02TD1396E:113a-16: rnam par bshad pas de legs par //
T02TD1396E:113a-17: mya ngan 'das pa thob par nye //
T02TD1396E:113a-18: de ni mtha' bral ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:113a-19: de yin pa yi rgyu mtshan yang //
T02TD1396E:113a-20: bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa //
T02TD1396E:113a-21: zhes pa bde ba dga' mchog dga' //
T02TD1396E:113a-22: sdug pa dga' bral dgos pa ste //
T02TD1396E:113a-23: mthar gyur lhan skyes ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:113a-24: mi 'dzag dga' ba chags bral la //
T02TD1396E:113a-26: thub pa med pa spang bya la //
T02TD1396E:113a-27: rgyas par byas pa dpe med pa //
T02TD1396E:113a-28: mi mngon dga' ba 'gro bar min //
T02TD1396E:113a-29: mi snang mchog dga' chags par min //
T02TD1396E:113a-30: gsal byed min ni dga' bral la //
T02TD1396E:113a-31: mi 'gyur lhan cig skyes pa ste //
T02TD1396E:113a-32: kun 'gro khyab pa po de nyid ;
T02TD1396E:113a-33: / phra zhing dh'u t'i zag med nyams //
T02TD1396E:113a-34: sa bon rtog pa'i dri ma bral //
T02TD1396E:113a-35: rdul med chags pa'i rdul med cing //
T02TD1396E:113a-36: rdul bral dngos po'i zhen pa spangs //
T02TD1396E:113a-37: dri ma med pa zhi ba'i dus //
T02TD1396E:113a-38: nyes pa spangs par rang bzhin rig / skyon med pa ni ma bsgribs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:113a-39: shin tu sad pa dbang dus su //
T02TD1396E:113a-40: go rtog skyes pa de yin la //
T02TD1396E:113a-41: legs par sad ni de nyid dang //
T02TD1396E:113a-42: ma bral rtag tu ldan pa'o //
T02TD1396E:113a-43: kun shes gzugs sogs thams cad la //
T02TD1396E:113a-44: lhan skyes shes pa kun rig pa //
T02TD1396E:113a-45: dam pa po ni mchog mi 'gyur //
T02TD1396E:113a-46: rnam par shes pa kun gzhir gnas ;
T02TD1396E:113a-47: / de yang mdo las 'di skad du //
T02TD1396E:113a-48: thog ma med pa dus kyi dbyings //
T02TD1396E:113a-49: chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te //
T02TD1396E:113a-50: de yod pas na 'gro kun dang //
T02TD1396E:113b-1: 'das pa gnyis med ye shes de //
T02TD1396E:113b-2: tshig gi yul min smra brjod bral //
T02TD1396E:113b-3: de yang he yi rdo rje las //
T02TD1396E:113b-4: ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul bral //
T02TD1396E:113b-5: bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pas shes //
T02TD1396E:113b-6: tshul 'chang ba ni bla ma yin //
T02TD1396E:113b-7: dus thabs bsten pas lhun grub tu //
T02TD1396E:113b-8: rnam par rtog med ye shes ni //
T02TD1396E:113b-9: gsum pa'i dus su nyams su myong //
T02TD1396E:113b-11: dus gsum sangs rgyas rtog pa'ang de //
T02TD1396E:113b-12: las byed pa ni de 'dra bas //
T02TD1396E:113b-13: rang gzhan gnyis ka smin pa'o //
T02TD1396E:113b-14: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
T02TD1396E:113b-15: ces pa do ni rtog pa'i don ;
T02TD1396E:113b-16: / sangs rgyas rang gi ngo gang la //
T02TD1396E:113b-17: thog ma mkha' 'dra skye ba med //
T02TD1396E:113b-18: mkha' dang 'dra bas bar du yang //
T02TD1396E:113b-19: gnas dus nyid nas mkha' dang 'dra //
T02TD1396E:113b-20: dper na gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin //
T02TD1396E:113b-21: rgyu lam 'bras bu rnam dag pas //
T02TD1396E:113b-22: re dogs kun dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1396E:113b-23: de ltar yin pa'i 'thad pa yang //
T02TD1396E:113b-24: dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
T02TD1396E:113b-25: zhes pa dus gsum dag pa'o //
T02TD1396E:113b-26: de thabs gang las skyes she na //
T02TD1396E:113b-27: ye shes lhan cig skyes pa la //
T02TD1396E:113b-28: mig gcig dh'u t'i nang yin te //
T02TD1396E:113b-29: dri med de ru rlung sems zhugs //
T02TD1396E:113b-30: ye shes lus can bde stong gang //
T02TD1396E:113b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1396E:113b-32: ma bsten rang lam byon gshegs byed //
T02TD1396E:113b-33: tshig gi dbang phyug rlung gnas pa //
T02TD1396E:113b-34: smra ba che ni gsung rdo rje //
T02TD1396E:113b-35: smra ba'i rlung la dbang phyug thig / smra pa'i rgyal po rtsar son pa //
T02TD1396E:113b-36: smra pa'i dam pa gsung rdo rje //
T02TD1396E:113b-37: mchog gi gsung ni gsung dag pa'o ;
T02TD1396E:113b-38: / rlung grub smra ba'i seng ge nyid //
T02TD1396E:113b-39: nyon mongs rnam dag mtshungs pa med //
T02TD1396E:113b-40: kun du lta ba spang blang med //
T02TD1396E:113b-41: mchog tu dga' ba ye shes snang //
T02TD1396E:113b-42: gzi brjid gsum mo ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:113b-43: phreng ba rgyud 'brel goms pa la //
T02TD1396E:113b-44: blta na sdug ni yon tan thob //
T02TD1396E:113b-46: / dpal gyi be'u bkra shis mtshan //
T02TD1396E:113b-48: lag pas nyams su blangs pa las //
T02TD1396E:113b-50: dug chen po ni dngos po'i gnod //
T02TD1396E:113b-51: 'dod chags la sogs gcod chen po //
T02TD1396E:113b-52: gtso mchog gi ni stong ba nyid //
T02TD1396E:114a-2: 'byin pa rlung bsgom bla na med //
T02TD1396E:114a-3: sman rnams ma lus gnyen po'i tshogs //
T02TD1396E:114a-4: ljon pa'i shing ni dh'u t'i rgyas //
T02TD1396E:114a-5: nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong la //
T02TD1396E:114a-6: nad ni thog med des mnar ba'o //
T02TD1396E:114a-7: des na de nyid dgrar che ba'o //
T02TD1396E:114a-8: 'jig rten gsum ni sgo gsum ste //
T02TD1396E:114a-9: thig le dkar dmar 'dres pa ni //
T02TD1396E:114a-10: yungs kar sbom po'i tshad tsam pa //
T02TD1396E:114a-12: dpal ldan bde chen khams yin te //
T02TD1396E:114a-13: rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can zhes pa //
T02TD1396E:114a-14: rgyu ba rtsa la skar ma thig / lus kyi khams rnams bskor ba'o //
T02TD1396E:114a-15: de yang rtsa thig du zhe na //
T02TD1396E:114a-16: gtsug tong bzhi pa dpral bcu drug / nyi shu bad kan mgrin so gnyis //
T02TD1396E:114a-17: snying gar brgyad de bzhi bcu'o //
T02TD1396E:114a-18: mkhris pa lte ba drug cu bzhi //
T02TD1396E:114a-19: gsang ba bcu drug brgyad cu po //
T02TD1396E:114a-20: rlung khams cha mnyam nor bu'i bar //
T02TD1396E:114a-21: bcu drug rigs drug nyi shu gnyis //
T02TD1396E:114a-23: rtsa re'i nang na rlung bcu ste //
T02TD1396E:114a-24: rlung la brten pas thig le re //
T02TD1396E:114a-25: de ltar rtsa rlung thig le la //
T02TD1396E:114a-26: rkang grangs sum stong sum brgya dang //
T02TD1396E:114a-27: drug cu tham pa yin par 'dod //
T02TD1396E:114a-28: de nyid dpa' bo dpa' mo ni //
T02TD1396E:114a-29: sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag / phyogs bcu lus kyi nying lag la //
T02TD1396E:114a-30: nam mkha'i mthar thug rlung lnga'i bar //
T02TD1396E:114a-31: chos kyi rgyal mtshan ye shes khams //
T02TD1396E:114a-32: mi 'dzag bde ba legs par 'dzug [*'jug?] / dh'u t'i rgyas pa mchog yin no //
T02TD1396E:114a-33: 'gro la rtsa rlung byang chub sems //
T02TD1396E:114a-34: gdugs bzhin bde chen 'khor lo la //
T02TD1396E:114a-35: yangs pa mi zad mdzod yin te //
T02TD1396E:114a-36: bde ba skyo ba phyir gdugs zhes brjod //
T02TD1396E:114a-37: de yang sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
T02TD1396E:114a-38: ae wam las ni 'byung ba dang //
T02TD1396E:114a-39: thabs mang myur dang bde skyob dang //
T02TD1396E:114a-40: 'dod chags chen pos rjes chags pa //
T02TD1396E:114a-41: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyun du 'dod //
T02TD1396E:114a-43: byams pa dang ni snying rje yi //
T02TD1396E:114a-44: bde chen dkyil 'khor can bdag nyid //
T02TD1396E:114a-45: dpal ldan rdo rje padma ni //
T02TD1396E:114a-47: gar gyi bdag ni sbyor thabs kyis //
T02TD1396E:114a-48: yan lag drug cu rtsa gnyis te //
T02TD1396E:114a-49: de yang gzhan gyi gzhung lugs yin //
T02TD1396E:114a-50: khyab bdag chen po thig le la //
T02TD1396E:114a-51: rin chen gdugs ni nor bu'i rtser //
T02TD1396E:114b-0: nyon mongs thams cad @114b bsil ba'o //
T02TD1396E:114b-1: gtum mo che las skyes pa yi //
T02TD1396E:114b-2: ye shes de la rab tu 'jug / de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi lam //
T02TD1396E:114b-3: mchog tu gyur pas rgyal po la //
T02TD1396E:114b-4: lam des sangs rgyas kun gyi sku //
T02TD1396E:114b-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi lam 'bras la //
T02TD1396E:114b-7: sbyor bar byed pas rnal 'byor che //
T02TD1396E:114b-8: sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa ni //
T02TD1396E:114b-9: bslab gsum yin la de 'di la //
T02TD1396E:114b-10: ldan pas lhan skyes bstan pa gcig /'di ni dang po'i dbang bskur te //
T02TD1396E:114b-11: rdo rje mtha' yas 'du shes dag / rin chen nyi mtshor ba dag / dbang bskur dpal ni don yod grub //
T02TD1396E:114b-12: 'du byed rnam dag kun bdag ni //
T02TD1396E:114b-13: rnam par snang mdzad gzugs phung dag / dbang phyug ste ni mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1396E:114b-14: rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa'o //
T02TD1396E:114b-16: rdo rje brtul zhugs kun gyi bdag / de ltar sgrub pa'i dbang phyug thob //
T02TD1396E:114b-18: mchog gam kun gyi rje bo'o //
T02TD1396E:114b-19: de yang gnas rdzas dag dbang dang //
T02TD1396E:114b-20: yon tan sgrub pa rnams sbyar ro //
T02TD1396E:114b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu che ba //
T02TD1396E:114b-22: zhes pa snod du gyur pa'o //
T02TD1396E:114b-23: rdo rje'i ming ni dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1396E:114b-24: skye ba 'dir ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD1396E:114b-25: ces pa 'di yi don bshad na //
T02TD1396E:114b-26: bum pas bskyed rim legs gnas khyod //
T02TD1396E:114b-27: khyod ni 'gro drug gang ma yin //
T02TD1396E:114b-28: de ni kun brtags yin zhe na //
T02TD1396E:114b-29: 'di yang kun brtags des na lha //
T02TD1396E:114b-30: bla ma'i drin las rnyed pa yi //
T02TD1396E:114b-31: ci phyir rin chen ces spras min //
T02TD1396E:114b-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
T02TD1396E:114b-34: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
T02TD1396E:114b-35: dbang dang rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs //
T02TD1396E:114b-36: lus kyi phrin las slob dpon che //
T02TD1396E:114b-37: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
T02TD1396E:114b-38: zhes pas gsas pa'i dbang yin te //
T02TD1396E:114b-39: bla ma yang yum gnyis med las //
T02TD1396E:114b-40: ye shes dkyil 'khor mngon sprul la //
T02TD1396E:114b-41: rdo rje nyi ma mtha' yas la //
T02TD1396E:114b-42: de yi bde ba snang ba che //
T02TD1396E:114b-43: rdo rje zla ba mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1396E:114b-45: bu yi lce la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1396E:114b-46: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
T02TD1396E:114b-47: zhes pa gsum pa'i dbang yin te //
T02TD1396E:114b-48: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin rnams la //
T02TD1396E:114b-49: chags bral bla mas mtshon par bya //
T02TD1396E:115a-0: @115a * // de ltar min na bla ma nyams //
T02TD1396E:115a-1: slob ma shin tu 'dod na yang //
T02TD1396E:115a-2: so sor thar pa spang bar bya //
T02TD1396E:115a-3: lam 'di lam mchog thub chen gsungs //
T02TD1396E:115a-4: gang zhag rnams la dge slong mchog / longs spyod gnas bsdams nam mkha' mthong //
T02TD1396E:115a-5: kha dog gnyis med lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1396E:115a-6: chags pa che ni bu de la //
T02TD1396E:115a-7: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud chen las //
T02TD1396E:115a-8: rigs ldan lo ni bcu drug ma //
T02TD1396E:115a-9: lang tsho sogs kyi brgyan pa la //
T02TD1396E:115a-10: dang po legs par bslab bya ste //
T02TD1396E:115a-11: dpral ba la sogs gnas lnga dgod //
T02TD1396E:115a-12: sangs rgyas skur ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1396E:115a-14: de yi cho ga yang gsungs pa //
T02TD1396E:115a-15: dang po gso sbyong sbyin par bya //
T02TD1396E:115a-16: de nas bslab pa'i gnas bcu sbyin //
T02TD1396E:115a-17: de nas bye brag mdo sde bstan //
T02TD1396E:115a-18: de nas dbu ma'i tshul lugs sbyin //
T02TD1396E:115a-19: de rjes dus kyi 'khor lo sbyin //
T02TD1396E:115a-21: ka ra na yi bstan bcos kyis //
T02TD1396E:115a-22: rnal 'byor ma yang rnam pa lnga //
T02TD1396E:115a-23: bzang mo cod pan dung can dang //
T02TD1396E:115a-24: ri mo can dang glang po can //
T02TD1396E:115a-25: gla rtsi pad rtsa chu dri dang //
T02TD1396E:115a-26: nya dang rnag gi dri yis mtshon //
T02TD1396E:115a-27: phag mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo //
T02TD1396E:115a-28: m'a ma k'i spyan ma yi rigs //
T02TD1396E:115a-29: lus ran rked phra rkang lag 'jam ;
T02TD1396E:115a-30: / lhung phyed rtse ldan phag mo yi //
T02TD1396E:115a-31: cung zad lus phra ring zhing mig / mi g-yo skra 'khyil pad can sgrol //
T02TD1396E:115a-32: 'dod chen ngo tsha med rtsol dga' //
T02TD1396E:115a-33: thung ba dung can gos dkar mo //
T02TD1396E:115a-34: ring zhing lus rgyas skra srab dang //
T02TD1396E:115a-35: so mtho thig le lta bur snang //
T02TD1396E:115a-36: ri mo can te m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1396E:115a-37: sbom thung lus mkhrang shin tu sra //
T02TD1396E:115a-38: smra brtson spyan ma glang po ma //
T02TD1396E:115a-39: de bzhin rnal 'byor pha yang lnga //
T02TD1396E:115a-40: seng ge ri dags rta glang po //
T02TD1396E:115a-41: mi bskyod don grub rin 'byung dang //
T02TD1396E:115a-42: 'od dpag med dang snang mdzad do //
T02TD1396E:115a-43: dri ni sngon dang 'dra ba la //
T02TD1396E:115a-44: dpen gnas 'jigs med yul dang bral //
T02TD1396E:115a-45: gtong dang sdom brtson mi bskyod rigs //
T02TD1396E:115a-46: myur du 'gro zhing myur du 'dzag / skrag cing 'jigs pa don grub po //
T02TD1396E:115a-47: 'dod chen gtong phod gzhan don brtson //
T02TD1396E:115a-48: gzhan dbang 'gyur pa nyi ma'i rigs //
T02TD1396E:115a-50: rang bzhin bems po yi yon tan //
T02TD1396E:115b-0: nya dri @115b 'od dpag med pa'i rigs //
T02TD1396E:115b-1: shin tu rmongs bzang smra ba nyung //
T02TD1396E:115b-2: rnag dri rnam par snang mdzad rigs //
T02TD1396E:115b-3: dri med 'od las de skad gsungs //
T02TD1396E:115b-5: shes rab de las byung ba dang //
T02TD1396E:115b-6: rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni //
T02TD1396E:115b-7: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sku bskyed la //
T02TD1396E:115b-8: sangs rgyas yang dag brjod chos ni //
T02TD1396E:115b-9: bum pa'i sbyor ba yan lag lnga //
T02TD1396E:115b-10: 'dus byas bsod nams tshogs kun gyi //
T02TD1396E:115b-12: 'dzin pa dbu ma me tog ldan //
T02TD1396E:115b-13: dpal ldan ye shes chen po ste //
T02TD1396E:115b-14: sangs rgyas padma las skyes pa'o //
T02TD1396E:115b-15: bzhi pa'i dbang bskur byas pa yis ;
T02TD1396E:115b-16: / kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
T02TD1396E:115b-17: phyag rgya chen po de rnyed pas //
T02TD1396E:115b-18: rjes la rtog pa'i snang ba ni //
T02TD1396E:115b-20: zhes pas rdo rje gcod pa las //
T02TD1396E:115b-21: skar ma rab rib mar me dang //
T02TD1396E:115b-22: sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang //
T02TD1396E:115b-23: rmi lam glog dang sprin dang ni //
T02TD1396E:115b-24: sgra brnyan mgal me gzugs brnyan dang //
T02TD1396E:115b-25: 'dus byas de ltar rtogs par bya //
T02TD1396E:115b-26: rtogs pa 'phags pa'i gang zag go //
T02TD1396E:115b-28: che ba bzhi pa'i ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:115b-29: gsum 'phags sangs rgyas rig sngags rgyal //
T02TD1396E:115b-30: rdo rje rnon po bzhi pa de //
T02TD1396E:115b-31: ral gri che de rtog kun gcod //
T02TD1396E:115b-32: yi ge mchog ste aa yin la //
T02TD1396E:115b-33: rnam par dag pa 'gyur pa med //
T02TD1396E:115b-34: dbang bzhi de yi yon tan ni //
T02TD1396E:115b-35: theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
T02TD1396E:115b-36: de yang mi spong brten pas gcod //
T02TD1396E:115b-37: mtshon cha chen po de nyid la //
T02TD1396E:115b-38: rdo rje chos zhes grags pa yin //
T02TD1396E:115b-39: rdo rje zab mo skye med la //
T02TD1396E:115b-41: / las rgyal dgra bcom zil mnan ba'o //
T02TD1396E:115b-42: don ni dbang bzhi'i don rnams la //
T02TD1396E:115b-43: rigs ni de nyid lam mchog rtogs //
T02TD1396E:115b-44: de nyid rdo rje blo gros la /
T02TD1396E:115b-45: yon tan 'di rnams bshad bzhin thob //
T02TD1396E:115b-46: pha rol phyin pa kun ni bcu //
T02TD1396E:115b-47: rdzogs pa dbang bzhi la ldan pa //
T02TD1396E:115b-48: sa rnams kun ni sa bcu la ;
T02TD1396E:115b-49: / rgyan rnams ldan ni dbang re zhing //
T02TD1396E:115b-50: dang pos dbang po gnyis pas bzhi //
T02TD1396E:115b-51: gsum pas bzhi dang bzhi pas gcig / de yang gsang ba mdzod las gsungs //
T02TD1396E:115b-52: rab tu dga' ba chu yi dbang //
T02TD1396E:115b-54: shes rab ye shes sbyang dka' ste //
T02TD1396E:116a-1: gyur mi g-yo ring song ba //
T02TD1396E:116a-2: phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1396E:116a-3: legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD1396E:116a-5: rnam par dag ba'i lam de yis //
T02TD1396E:116a-6: bdag med chos nyid rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD1396E:116a-7: yang dag ye shes bde chen po //
T02TD1396E:116a-8: zla 'od bzang po ham las thob ;
T02TD1396E:116a-9: / brtson chen bum pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1396E:116a-10: sgyu 'phrul dra ba rtsa rlung khyab //
T02TD1396E:116a-11: rgyud kun gyi ni rtsa rlung nyid //
T02TD1396E:116a-12: bdag po thig le mchog bde stong //
T02TD1396E:116a-13: rdo rje gdan ni lte ba la //
T02TD1396E:116a-14: ma lus ldan ni rigs drug dang //
T02TD1396E:116a-15: 'phro ba chu tshod dbyu gu dang //
T02TD1396E:116a-17: lta stangs yon tan rlung grub dus //
T02TD1396E:116a-18: ye shes sku ni mtshan ma la //
T02TD1396E:116a-19: rnams ni dug sogs bco lnga la //
T02TD1396E:116a-20: ma lus 'chang ni re kh'a mthong //
T02TD1396E:116a-21: blo gros bzang po rtog dpyod pa //
T02TD1396E:116a-22: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes can //
T02TD1396E:116a-23: kun du bzang po mnyam pa nyid //
T02TD1396E:116a-24: phyag rgya chen po lhun gyis grub //
T02TD1396E:116a-25: sa ni sa sogs 'byung lnga yi //
T02TD1396E:116a-26: snying po ye shes rlung grub pa'o //
T02TD1396E:116a-28: sangs rgyas kun ni gshegs pa'i lam //
T02TD1396E:116a-29: snying po chen po dh'u t'ir zhugs //
T02TD1396E:116a-30: dus sbyor la sogs bcu gnyis ni //
T02TD1396E:116a-31: rim gyis rim gyis rnam dag pas //
T02TD1396E:116a-32: sprul pa'i 'khor lo rgya la sogs //
T02TD1396E:116a-34: rgyas par dri ma med par blta //
T02TD1396E:116a-35: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog / mi 'gyur 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD1396E:116a-36: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni //
T02TD1396E:116a-37: skye med rtogs pa'i lta ba 'dzin //
T02TD1396E:116a-38: skye med chos te don dam pa //
T02TD1396E:116a-39: sna tshogs don ni kun rdzob la //
T02TD1396E:116a-40: chos kun theg pa sna tshogs la //
T02TD1396E:116a-41: ngo bo nyid ni mthar thug pa //
T02TD1396E:116a-42: 'chang ni bde stong dran pas skyong //
T02TD1396E:116a-43: shes rab chen po stong pa nyid //
T02TD1396E:116a-44: skad cig tshe gcig 'jam dpal mthong //
T02TD1396E:116a-46: khong du chud pa ro gcig 'chang //
T02TD1396E:116a-47: chos kun khams gsum rtog pa gsum //
T02TD1396E:116a-48: rdul mun snying stobs bde chen du //
T02TD1396E:116a-49: mngon par rtogs pa mchog yin te //
T02TD1396E:116a-50: thub pa mi 'dzag blo mchog ni //
T02TD1396E:116a-51: rnam grol bde stong 'byung po sel //
T02TD1396E:116a-52: mi g-yo rlung la de yis ni //
T02TD1396E:116a-53: rab tu dang ba'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1396E:116a-54: thig le bde bas brgyan pa la //
T02TD1396E:116a-55: spro dga' gnas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1396E:116b-0: @116b de lta'i rang bzhin byang chub 'chang //
T02TD1396E:116b-1: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes de //
T02TD1396E:116b-2: rnal 'byor pa yi mngon sum pa //
T02TD1396E:116b-3: gnyen po ye shes me lce can //
T02TD1396E:116b-5: gnas pa lus la 'khor lo drug /'byung ba phung po rnam pa lnga //
T02TD1396E:116b-6: yon tan drug dang mtha' drug dang //
T02TD1396E:116b-7: las kyi dbang phyug byed dbang drug / zhi gnas lhag mthong rnam pa gnyis //
T02TD1396E:116b-8: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dag pa yis //
T02TD1396E:116b-9: tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dag / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o /
T02TD1396E:116b-11: // / dgu pa rin chen 'byung ldan ni //
T02TD1396E:116b-12: mnyam nyid ye shes le'u ston //
T02TD1396E:116b-13: 'dod pa mchog gi ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:116b-14: don grub de ni bde bas thob //
T02TD1396E:116b-15: dam pa ste ni rtsol ba med //
T02TD1396E:116b-16: ngan song dgu ni dug gsum la //
T02TD1396E:116b-17: thams cad nyon mongs brgyad khri stong //
T02TD1396E:116b-18: rnam par sbyong ba ma rig pa //
T02TD1396E:116b-19: lhan skyes ye shes chen po rtogs //
T02TD1396E:116b-20: mgon po rdo rje theg pa 'di //
T02TD1396E:116b-21: sems can kun gyi lam mchog go //
T02TD1396E:116b-22: sems can thams cad ma lus pa //
T02TD1396E:116b-23: phyag rgya chen por rab sgrol byed //
T02TD1396E:116b-24: 'khrul pa'i snang ba nyon mongs g-yul //
T02TD1396E:116b-25: stong nyid gcig pus 'joms pas dpa' //
T02TD1396E:116b-27: de nyid dgra ste dregs pa 'joms //
T02TD1396E:116b-28: 'joms pas dpal ldan nyid yin la //
T02TD1396E:116b-29: blo ldan chos ldan chos de yis //
T02TD1396E:116b-30: sgeg pa 'chang ba ye shes ldan //
T02TD1396E:116b-31: brtan po gtsug tor thig le brtan //
T02TD1396E:116b-32: mi sdug stong ba shes rab la //
T02TD1396E:116b-33: gzugs 'chad pa ni bde stong ldan ;
T02TD1396E:116b-34: / lag pa g-yas g-yon rlung gnyis so //
T02TD1396E:116b-35: brgya phrag kun ni nyi khri dang //
T02TD1396E:116b-36: chig stong drug brgya'i grangs yin la //
T02TD1396E:116b-37: bskyod cing zhes pa rnam shes rta //
T02TD1396E:116b-38: 'phags pa klu sgrub zhal snga nas //
T02TD1396E:116b-39: sems can kun gyi srog gyur pa //
T02TD1396E:116b-40: rlung zhes bya ba las kun byed //
T02TD1396E:116b-41: lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can //
T02TD1396E:116b-43: rtsa lam dh'u t'ir 'jug pa ste //
T02TD1396E:116b-44: goms pa'i stabs kyis gar byed cing //
T02TD1396E:116b-45: zhes pa sa ma he du sogs //
T02TD1396E:116b-46: skar ma drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD1396E:116b-47: dpal ldan dh'u t'ir lag pa gnyis //
T02TD1396E:116b-48: brgyas gang la ni rlung rtsa gang //
T02TD1396E:117a-2: khyab par stong pa rlung dang ni //
T02TD1396E:117a-3: thig les brgyan pa gar byed pa'o //
T02TD1396E:117a-4: ya bo gcig gi khyon gyis ni //
T02TD1396E:117a-5: zhes pa ya bo ster rlung ste //
T02TD1396E:117a-6: khyon ni thams cad rdzogs par blang //
T02TD1396E:117a-8: mthil du gnon ni snying dbus na //
T02TD1396E:117a-9: chu shing me tog lta bu yi //
T02TD1396E:117a-10: dpyid kyi thig ler thim pa'o //
T02TD1396E:117a-11: ming gzugs glang bo can zhes grags //
T02TD1396E:117a-12: tshangs pa yi ni sgo nga'i rtse //
T02TD1396E:117a-13: zhes pa tshangs sgo rtsa 'bras gnyis //
T02TD1396E:117a-15: khyon ni lus la rkang mtheb kyi //
T02TD1396E:117a-16: sen mo mnan pas gtum mo 'bar //
T02TD1396E:117a-17: dpyid kyi thig le 'byung ba bzhin //
T02TD1396E:117a-18: kha ba ba mo lta bur 'dzag / de yi 'phel grib dkar nag phyogs //
T02TD1396E:117a-20: tshangs pa'i sgo nga gtsug tor rgyal //
T02TD1396E:117a-21: rtse nas rim gyis 'grib pa las //
T02TD1396E:117a-22: nag po g-yon pa'i ma rol 'bab //
T02TD1396E:117a-23: don gcig mi 'gyur byang chub sems //
T02TD1396E:117a-24: gnyis med gzung 'dzin skye mched drug / chos kyi don zhes gsungs pa ni //
T02TD1396E:117a-25: chos kyi yul dang yul can la //
T02TD1396E:117a-26: mig las snying gzugs rdo rje //
T02TD1396E:117a-27: rna ba phyag rdor sgra rdo rje //
T02TD1396E:117a-28: sna la 'jam dbyangs dri rdo rje //
T02TD1396E:117a-29: lce la spyan gzigs ro rdo rje //
T02TD1396E:117a-30: lus la sgrib sel reg rdo rje //
T02TD1396E:117a-31: yid la rdor sems chos rdo rje ;
T02TD1396E:117a-32: / dbang yul bden par grub pa med //
T02TD1396E:117a-33: dper na lha sbyin gcig nyid la //
T02TD1396E:117a-34: chags sdang gti mug gsum skye ba //
T02TD1396E:117a-35: chung ma dgra dang phal pas phye //
T02TD1396E:117a-36: des na yul gyis gnod pa med //
T02TD1396E:117a-37: don ni bde ba chen spros bral lo //
T02TD1396E:117a-38: de nyid dam pa'i don yin te //
T02TD1396E:117a-39: 'jigs pa med pa phyag rgya che //
T02TD1396E:117a-40: rnam rig kun brtags log shes pa //
T02TD1396E:117a-41: sna tshogs gzugs ni gzhan gyi dbang //
T02TD1396E:117a-42: rgyu rkyen dngos po'i snang ba'o //
T02TD1396E:117a-43: don can dmigs med yongs su grub //
T02TD1396E:117a-44: sems ni gsum po rang sems te //
T02TD1396E:117a-45: rang gi ngo bo rnam shes ni //
T02TD1396E:117a-47: dngos ni yul te dga' ba las //
T02TD1396E:117a-48: don ni yul can mchog dga' nyid //
T02TD1396E:117a-49: ma lus yul dang yul can rnams //
T02TD1396E:117a-50: dga' ba gsum 'dus bcad thob pa //
T02TD1396E:117a-51: reg pa lhan skyes ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:117a-52: stong pa nyid dga' dga' bral ba //
T02TD1396E:117a-53: mchog gi ye shes dbu ma'i lam //
T02TD1396E:117a-54: yid la mi byed 'dod chags blo //
T02TD1396E:117b-1: srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs pa yi //
T02TD1396E:117b-3: srid gsum lus ngag yid gsum la //
T02TD1396E:117b-4: dga' ba chen po ye shes khyab //
T02TD1396E:117b-5: sprin dkar dag pa rdo rje sems //
T02TD1396E:117b-6: dkar po tshor bde gnyis su med //
T02TD1396E:117b-7: 'od bzang bag chags spong gnyen po ;
T02TD1396E:117b-9: thig le bde chen mkha' la gnas //
T02TD1396E:117b-10: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
T02TD1396E:117b-11: gtum mo ye shes me 'bar ba //
T02TD1396E:117b-12: de bzhin gshegs dang yum rnams bsregs //
T02TD1396E:117b-14: byang sems mer 'dres shas cher dmar //
T02TD1396E:117b-15: cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse //
T02TD1396E:117b-16: gtsug tor gnas pa stod par byed //
T02TD1396E:117b-17: skra mchog mthon ka ham las ni //
T02TD1396E:117b-18: chen po can ni bindu gnas //
T02TD1396E:117b-19: nor bu chen po bum par zhugs //
T02TD1396E:117b-20: 'od chags dpal ni bde mi rtog / sangs rgyas sprul ba'i rgyan dang ldan //
T02TD1396E:117b-21: ces pa'i don ni 'di yin te //
T02TD1396E:117b-23: de yang rgyud las gsungs pa ni //
T02TD1396E:117b-24: mngal gyi khru ma chos gos te //
T02TD1396E:117b-25: spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag / gcer bu skra dang kha spu bregs //
T02TD1396E:117b-26: sngags kyi bzlas pa aa dang ham //
T02TD1396E:117b-27: zla ba bcu gnyis khrims gyi [*kyi] gnas //
T02TD1396E:117b-28: pha dang ma ni mkhan slob nyid //
T02TD1396E:117b-29: rang byung skyes pas dge slong nyid //
T02TD1396E:117b-30: rdo rje sems dpa' 'dus ma byas //
T02TD1396E:117b-31: sred pa'i chags pa rnam par dag / ces pa'o //
T02TD1396E:117b-32: 'jig rten lus ngag yid gsum la //
T02TD1396E:117b-33: khams brgya kun spyod khyab pa'o //
T02TD1396E:117b-34: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa phyi nang rlung //
T02TD1396E:117b-35: yongs su rdzogs pa len par byed //
T02TD1396E:117b-36: stobs chen ldan ni bde chen rgyas //
T02TD1396E:117b-37: de nyid mi 'bral ldan pa ni //
T02TD1396E:117b-39: dran pa bzhi ni tsum ba na //
T02TD1396E:117b-40: yul bzhi rjes su dran pa ste //
T02TD1396E:117b-41: gnyis gnyis 'khyud dang lag bcangs dang //
T02TD1396E:117b-42: bltas dang bgad pas tshim pa ni //
T02TD1396E:117b-43: rim gyi dran bzhir dbang bzhi sbyar //
T02TD1396E:117b-44: mchog ni bltas pas tshim pa'o //
T02TD1396E:117b-45: byang chub yan lag ces pa ni //
T02TD1396E:117b-46: byang chub thig le 'byung ba'i rgyu //
T02TD1396E:117b-47: zas bad mkhris dang sha khrag dang //
T02TD1396E:117b-48: rus ba klad pa bdun yan lag / me tog kun da spos gtum mo //
T02TD1396E:117b-49: de yang lan bdun bza' bar bya //
T02TD1396E:118a-2: de bzhin chos kun gshegs pa'am //
T02TD1396E:118a-3: yon tan mtsho ni srid pa sel //
T02TD1396E:118a-4: lam ni aa wa dh'u t'i la //
T02TD1396E:118a-5: yan lag me rlung thig le'o //
T02TD1396E:118a-6: brgyad ni yas 'bab mas brtan pa'o //
T02TD1396E:118a-7: tshul rig bla ma'i ngag las so //
T02TD1396E:118a-8: yang dag rang byung ye shes la ;
T02TD1396E:118a-9: / sangs rgyas lam ni zung 'jug pa //
T02TD1396E:118a-10: mthar thug lam du rig pa'o //
T02TD1396E:118a-11: des na sems can kun la ni //
T02TD1396E:118a-12: sgyu ma lta bur shas cher chags //
T02TD1396E:118a-13: chags pa 'khor ba yin zhe na //
T02TD1396E:118a-14: nam mkha' lta bur chags ba med //
T02TD1396E:118a-15: chags pa med bzhin 'gro don du //
T02TD1396E:118a-16: sems can kun gyi yid la ni //
T02TD1396E:118a-17: gang 'dul skye ba len cing 'jug / sems can kun gyi yid lta bur //
T02TD1396E:118a-18: brtson 'grus chen pos don byed ma gyogs [*mgyogs?] //
T02TD1396E:118a-19: sems can kun gyi dbang don ni //
T02TD1396E:118a-20: rab 'bring chen po mchog rnams shes //
T02TD1396E:118a-21: sems can kun gyi don byed tshul //
T02TD1396E:118a-23: phung po lnga po don dam pa //
T02TD1396E:118a-24: mya ngan 'das shing ma dmigs pas //
T02TD1396E:118a-25: de nyid shes ni ye shes lnga'o //
T02TD1396E:118a-26: rnam dag phung po lnga po ni //
T02TD1396E:118a-27: tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang //
T02TD1396E:118a-28: rnam grol rnam grol ye shes mthong //
T02TD1396E:118a-30: gang yod de la phud lnga ldan //
T02TD1396E:118a-31: nges 'byung kun gyi byang chub gsum //
T02TD1396E:118a-32: mtha' la gnas ni rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD1396E:118a-33: nges 'byung kun mtha' gong ma nyid //
T02TD1396E:118a-34: de la mkhas pa rdo rje theg / nges 'byung kun gyi lam la ni //
T02TD1396E:118a-35: ngo bor bde chen ye shes gnas //
T02TD1396E:118a-36: nges par 'byung ba rnam pa kun //
T02TD1396E:118a-37: bshad cing spyod pa ston pa'o //
T02TD1396E:118a-38: yan lag bcu gnyis ma rig sogs //
T02TD1396E:118a-39: ma bkag srid rtsa 'khor ba'i rgyu //
T02TD1396E:118a-40: de ltar yin par byams pas gsungs //
T02TD1396E:118a-41: sgrib pa'i phyir dang 'debs phyir dang //
T02TD1396E:118a-43: rdzogs byed gsum 'dus gcod phyir dang //
T02TD1396E:118a-44: nye bar spyod dang sdud pa'i phyir //
T02TD1396E:118a-45: sbyor ba byed dang mngon du byed //
T02TD1396E:118a-46: sdug bsngal phyir na 'og nyon mongs //
T02TD1396E:118a-48: mchog tu mi 'gyur ye shes nyid //
T02TD1396E:118a-49: rtogs dang myong bas srid rtsa bton //
T02TD1396E:118a-50: de nyid dag pa nyid yin la //
T02TD1396E:118a-51: rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang zhes pa //
T02TD1396E:118b-0: rten 'brel dag pas @118b gnas la sogs //
T02TD1396E:118b-1: bcu gnyis kun du spyod pa'o //
T02TD1396E:118b-2: bden bzhi lte snying mgrin dpral ba //
T02TD1396E:118b-3: tshul gyi rnam pa can zhes pa //
T02TD1396E:118b-5: gnas brtan phal chen mang bkur smra //
T02TD1396E:118b-6: bden pa re res lam 'bras byed //
T02TD1396E:118b-7: shes pa brgyad po zhes pa ni //
T02TD1396E:118b-8: sna tshogs rnam smin rnams med dang //
T02TD1396E:118b-9: lha sngags ye shes dga' bzhi brgyad //
T02TD1396E:118b-10: rtog pa 'chang ni de dag pa'o //
T02TD1396E:118b-11: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ni //
T02TD1396E:118b-12: byed dbang myong ba rnam par smin //
T02TD1396E:118b-14: ldan pa rdo rje'i sku yin no //
T02TD1396E:118b-15: de nyid thig le chen po la //
T02TD1396E:118b-16: dga' ba rnam pa bcu drug rigs //
T02TD1396E:118b-17: rnam pa nyi shu phung lnga dang //
T02TD1396E:118b-18: 'byung lnga yab lnga yum lnga la //
T02TD1396E:118b-19: byang chub pa ni bdes khyab pa'o //
T02TD1396E:118b-20: rnam par mi 'dra ba yin la //
T02TD1396E:118b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang 'byung gi / ye shes lhan cig skyes rig mchog / sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul ba'i sku //
T02TD1396E:118b-22: skye dang las dang bzo dang mchog / de nyid dbab zlog bskyil dgram pa'o //
T02TD1396E:118b-23: bye ba dpag med rlung gis ni //
T02TD1396E:118b-25: skad cig dus mtha'i skad cig la //
T02TD1396E:118b-26: thams cad lhan skyes mngon par rtogs //
T02TD1396E:118b-27: sems kyi skad cig lhan skyes bde //
T02TD1396E:118b-28: don kun rigs ni bzhi pa'o /
T02TD1396E:118b-29: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyi //
T02TD1396E:118b-30: zhes pa theg gsum gnas pa ni //
T02TD1396E:118b-31: sbyor ba dgu yi tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1396E:118b-32: 'gro ba'i sems can sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1396E:118b-33: don byed ji ltar gdul don du //
T02TD1396E:118b-34: ston pa po ni chos don nges //
T02TD1396E:118b-35: theg pa gsum ni dbang gsum gyi //
T02TD1396E:118b-36: bzhi pa kho na'i nges 'byung la //
T02TD1396E:118b-37: bde chen theg gcig gis 'bras bu //
T02TD1396E:118b-38: bla ma'i dus thabs lta bur gnas //
T02TD1396E:118b-39: nyon mongs khams rnams drug gyur pa //
T02TD1396E:118b-40: dag pa'i bdag nyid shuddha ste //
T02TD1396E:118b-41: gzhan dag nyon mongs spang ba'o //
T02TD1396E:118b-42: rdo rje theg pas rtog pa 'dzoms //
T02TD1396E:118b-43: nyon zad rtog med ma yin te //
T02TD1396E:118b-44: rtog bral ci yang gnas pa med //
T02TD1396E:118b-45: de yis de nyid rnyed pa yis //
T02TD1396E:118b-46: dge sdig rtog pa las kyi khams //
T02TD1396E:118b-47: bde ba chen po zad che ba'o //
T02TD1396E:118b-48: chu bo rnam pa lnga yin te //
T02TD1396E:118b-49: bdag lta'i chu bo rdzas chu bo //
T02TD1396E:118b-50: zhe sdang gti mug chu bo dang //
T02TD1396E:118b-51: 'dod chags chu yi rgyun phyogs khyer //
T02TD1396E:119a-2: rgya mtsho ma lus rgal ba'o //
T02TD1396E:119a-3: de rnams yongs su dag pa yis //
T02TD1396E:119a-4: kun las rgal zhes brjod pa yin //
T02TD1396E:119a-5: sbyor ba thabs dang shes rab la //
T02TD1396E:119a-6: chags bral chags pa mya ngan 'das //
T02TD1396E:119a-7: bde ba tshor ba sred pa 'dzin //
T02TD1396E:119a-8: ngo tsha rtse dang lta rol ba //
T02TD1396E:119a-9: shes rab ma yi chos brgyad do //
T02TD1396E:119a-10: chags dang tshim dang dga' ba dang //
T02TD1396E:119a-11: gya nom pa dang rtse ba dang //
T02TD1396E:119a-12: tsum ba nyed dang sgra brjod dang //
T02TD1396E:119a-13: brtan dang brtson dang yid byed pa //
T02TD1396E:119a-14: bcu gcig thabs kyi byed pa'o //
T02TD1396E:119a-15: de lta'i chos spangs sems can ni //
T02TD1396E:119a-16: ye shes rnyed dka' dgon par 'dod //
T02TD1396E:119a-17: de las byung ba ye shes rten //
T02TD1396E:119a-18: de 'dra'i rnam grol lam gyis ni //
T02TD1396E:119a-19: nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs //
T02TD1396E:119a-20: 'khrul pa'i khams rnams rtog pa kun //
T02TD1396E:119a-21: bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa //
T02TD1396E:119a-22: de ni thabs chen dug la bsngags //
T02TD1396E:119a-23: brtul ba lta bu yon tan thob //
T02TD1396E:119a-24: sngags med dug gis 'chi bar byed //
T02TD1396E:119a-25: sngags ni snying rje chen po dang //
T02TD1396E:119a-26: shes rab stong par rtogs pa yis //
T02TD1396E:119a-27: sbyor sgrol byed pa thabs kyi mchog / de ltar las rnams don yod pas //
T02TD1396E:119a-28: bde bas 'gro ba'i don byed pas //
T02TD1396E:119a-29: srid dang zhi bar mi gnas spa'o //
T02TD1396E:119a-30: 'du shes ming dang rdzas dang brda //
T02TD1396E:119a-31: kun gyi don spangs mnyam gzhag cing //
T02TD1396E:119a-32: rnam shes don ni 'od gsal bas //
T02TD1396E:119a-33: bltas pas rtog kun 'gag par byed //
T02TD1396E:119a-34: sems can 'gro ba rigs drug la //
T02TD1396E:119a-35: rnams kyi yid yul dug gsum sogs //
T02TD1396E:119a-36: ldan pa chags sdang sems skyes pa'o //
T02TD1396E:119a-37: de 'dra sems can kun gyi yid ;
T02TD1396E:119a-38: / rig pas 'khrul spangs gnyen ye shes //
T02TD1396E:119a-39: sems can kun gyi yid la ni //
T02TD1396E:119a-40: 'od gsal chos dbyings rab tu gnas //
T02TD1396E:119a-41: de dag don byed ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:119a-42: sems dang mthun par 'jug cing bsgyur //
T02TD1396E:119a-43: sems can kun yid gang yod pa //
T02TD1396E:119a-44: tshim par byed de ma spangs grol ;
T02TD1396E:119a-45: / sems can kun gyi 'khor ba'i gnas //
T02TD1396E:119a-46: yid dga' ba ni lam thob pa'o //
T02TD1396E:119a-47: grub mtha' rang rang 'dod pa la //
T02TD1396E:119a-48: 'dod pa med pa mthar phyin pa'o //
T02TD1396E:119a-49: 'khrul pa med do dam pa'i don //
T02TD1396E:119a-50: de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas las //
T02TD1396E:119a-51: ji bzhin pa ni rtog dang bral //
T02TD1396E:119b-0: byis pa @119b rnam gnyis rnam par rtog / rtog bral rgyal ba chos kyi sku //
T02TD1396E:119b-1: lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can yin //
T02TD1396E:119b-3: nor pa rtag chad la sogs pa //
T02TD1396E:119b-4: thams cad de la rnam par spangs //
T02TD1396E:119b-5: don gsum kun brtags gzhan dbang dang //
T02TD1396E:119b-6: yongs grub de nyid shes pa yis //
T02TD1396E:119b-7: the tshom med pa'i blo thob pa'o //
T02TD1396E:119b-8: kun don 'gro ba'i bya ba la //
T02TD1396E:119b-9: yon tan gsum gyi bdag nyid can //
T02TD1396E:119b-10: phung po lnga don bde chen du //
T02TD1396E:119b-11: dus gsum mnyam nyid rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1396E:119b-12: skad cig gcig la dbu ma can //
T02TD1396E:119b-13: rlung rnams thams cad bye brag phyed //
T02TD1396E:119b-14: skad cig gcig gis dbu mar tshud ;
T02TD1396E:119b-15: / de la bde stong rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1396E:119b-16: de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi ni //
T02TD1396E:119b-18: yan lag med pa chos kyi sku /
T02TD1396E:119b-20: // sku ni longs sku bde ba che //
T02TD1396E:119b-21: lus kyi mchog ni sprul pa'i sku //
T02TD1396E:119b-22: mtshan dpes brgyan pa de yin no //
T02TD1396E:119b-23: lus kyi mtha' ni sku gsum du //
T02TD1396E:119b-24: rtogs pa po ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02TD1396E:119b-25: de yi mchog thob dus dag tu //
T02TD1396E:119b-26: sna tshogs gzugs ni yongs su ston //
T02TD1396E:119b-27: zhes pa mi 'dra sna tshogs gzugs //
T02TD1396E:119b-28: gang la gang 'dul yongs su ston //
T02TD1396E:119b-29: bsgrub bya yin pas nor bu las //
T02TD1396E:119b-31: nub pa med pas tog ces bya //
T02TD1396E:119b-32: dgag phyogs ma rig la sogs pa //
T02TD1396E:119b-33: bcu gnyis spangs te mthun pa'i phyogs //
T02TD1396E:119b-34: sa bcu gnyis ni thob pa las //
T02TD1396E:119b-35: tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u dgu pa'o /
T02TD1396E:119b-37: // / le'u bcu pa don yod grub //
T02TD1396E:119b-38: bya ba nan tan ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:119b-39: las kyi bya ba tshes bco lnga //
T02TD1396E:119b-40: dag pa shloka bco lnga bstan //
T02TD1396E:119b-41: sangs rgyas kun ni dus gsum bzhugs //
T02TD1396E:119b-42: rtogs bya ba ni ye shes sku //
T02TD1396E:119b-43: de yang de nyid 'dus pa las //
T02TD1396E:119b-44: khyod ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i yab //
T02TD1396E:119b-46: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la brten //
T02TD1396E:119b-47: de bzhin gshegs rnams khyod la brten //
T02TD1396E:119b-49: sangs rgyas byang chub lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1396E:119b-50: bla na med pa gong na med //
T02TD1396E:119b-51: yi ge med las gsang sngags 'byung //
T02TD1396E:119b-52: zhes pa byang chub yi ge med //
T02TD1396E:119b-53: de las gsang sngags byung ba ni //
T02TD1396E:120a-0: @120a * // sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yin no //
T02TD1396E:120a-1: gsang sngags chen po rlung yin te //
T02TD1396E:120a-3: de ni rlung gi byed pa'o //
T02TD1396E:120a-4: gsang sngags don kun bde ba ste //
T02TD1396E:120a-5: bde med rlung ni nyan thos yod //
T02TD1396E:120a-7: phrin las zhi rgyas dbang drag bzhi //
T02TD1396E:120a-9: thig le che ni don dam pa //
T02TD1396E:120a-10: bde chen rdo rje sems dpa' la //
T02TD1396E:120a-11: yi ge med pa nyid yin no //
T02TD1396E:120a-12: stong pa yi ge med pa nyid //
T02TD1396E:120a-13: chen po 'byung lnga phung po lnga //
T02TD1396E:120a-14: yi ge lnga ni 'di yin te //
T02TD1396E:120a-15: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: kham lnga dang //
T02TD1396E:120a-16: lam mam pam tam bam rnams so //
T02TD1396E:120a-17: thig les rtsa rnams yi ger 'gyur //
T02TD1396E:120a-18: gyur pas bde ba sna tshogs 'byung //
T02TD1396E:120a-19: rlung gis khams gsum rtog pa rgyas //
T02TD1396E:120a-20: stong pa rang gi ngo bos stong //
T02TD1396E:120a-21: bde bsdus yi ge drug po ni //
T02TD1396E:120a-22: aa: ham aom h'um ho ksha: drug / re rer bde rlung 'dus pa las //
T02TD1396E:120a-23: lus ngag yid la mtshan ma 'byung //
T02TD1396E:120a-24: yang na snying dbus cha drug pa'i //
T02TD1396E:120a-26: kun rdzob rnam pa kun ldan la //
T02TD1396E:120a-27: don dam par ni rnam pa med //
T02TD1396E:120a-28: dga' ba de nyid dga' bcu drug / mgrin pa la sogs phyed phyed 'dri //
T02TD1396E:120a-29: thig le gnas nas nor bu'i rtser //
T02TD1396E:120a-30: gnyis gnas pa ni dbus na'o //
T02TD1396E:120a-31: de nyid shes rab ye shes so //
T02TD1396E:120a-32: rnam rtog yan lag med pa'o //
T02TD1396E:120a-33: grangs bgrang byis pa'i rtsis las 'das //
T02TD1396E:120a-34: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtog dpyod dang //
T02TD1396E:120a-35: dga' bde bzhi sde dga' bzhi sbyar //
T02TD1396E:120a-36: rtse mo 'chang ni gtsug nor gnyis //
T02TD1396E:120a-38: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
T02TD1396E:120a-39: thabs dang rtog pa las rgya'i las //
T02TD1396E:120a-40: ting 'dzin rig par byed pa'i dus //
T02TD1396E:120a-41: chos kyi phyag rgyar rgyud rig pa //
T02TD1396E:120a-42: gzhan dbang bskyed pa'i rim pa ste //
T02TD1396E:120a-44: lus kyi mchog ni dga' ba'i dus //
T02TD1396E:120a-45: phyag rgya chen po lhun grub pa'o //
T02TD1396E:120a-46: bde ba'i dus su longs spyod rdzogs //
T02TD1396E:120a-47: dam tshig phyag rgya kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD1396E:120a-48: phrin las bde ba chen po byed //
T02TD1396E:120a-49: de nyid gnas skabs sprul sku ste //
T02TD1396E:120a-50: sku yi mchog tu thub pas gsungs //
T02TD1396E:120a-51: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud rigs lnga //
T02TD1396E:120a-53: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams brgya ru //
T02TD1396E:120b-1: / ji bzhin mchog gi sprul pa yis //
T02TD1396E:120b-3: lha ni au ma 'dod chags dag / lha mchog shes rab 'od dpag med //
T02TD1396E:120b-4: lha ni tshangs pa khyab 'jug ni //
T02TD1396E:120b-5: gti mug rnam dag rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1396E:120b-6: lha min khyab 'jug dbang phyug ni //
T02TD1396E:120b-7: zhe sdang rnam dag mi bskyod ba //
T02TD1396E:120b-8: sbyin pa dzam lha bdag po ni //
T02TD1396E:120b-9: ser sna rnam dag rin 'byung ngo //
T02TD1396E:120b-10: 'chi med dbang phyug dbang phyug ni //
T02TD1396E:120b-11: phrag dog rnams la don yod grub //
T02TD1396E:120b-12: lha ni bgegs bdag bla ma ni //
T02TD1396E:120b-13: nga rgyal rnam dag rdo rje sems //
T02TD1396E:120b-14: 'joms byed zla ba lta ba lnga //
T02TD1396E:120b-15: rnam par dag byed phag mo gnyis ;
T02TD1396E:120b-16: /'joms byed nyi ma dbang phyug ni //
T02TD1396E:120b-17: the tshom kun sel he ru ka / rtsa ba'i nyon mongs lha chen brgyad //
T02TD1396E:120b-18: srid gsum dbang bsgyur 'joms mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1396E:120b-19: bde chen khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1396E:120b-20: srid pa khams gsum dgon pa ni //
T02TD1396E:120b-21: bde stong dkon pas dgon pa'o //
T02TD1396E:120b-22: las rgal ba ni rdo rje sems //
T02TD1396E:120b-23: ston pa gcig pu dh'u t'i'o //
T02TD1396E:120b-25: 'gro ba'i bla ma thig le'i khams //
T02TD1396E:120b-26: 'jig rten lus ngag yid gsum la //
T02TD1396E:120b-27: phyogs bcur rab grags bde rlung khyab //
T02TD1396E:120b-28: chos kyi sbyin bdag gtum mo che //
T02TD1396E:120b-30: byams pa'i dam tshig bzhi pa bsten pa'o //
T02TD1396E:120b-31: de yang spang blang bsrung spel lo //
T02TD1396E:120b-32: go chas chas pa dga' ba'i sems //
T02TD1396E:120b-33: snying rje yis ni gzhan don spyod //
T02TD1396E:120b-34: ya lad bgos ni thabs bsten pa'o //
T02TD1396E:120b-35: shes rab phyag rgya chen mo la //
T02TD1396E:120b-36: ral gri de yis rtog kun bcad //
T02TD1396E:120b-37: mda' gzhu gtum mo thogs pa ni //
T02TD1396E:120b-39: nyon mongs mi shes 'dzag pa rnams //
T02TD1396E:120b-40: rab tu spang ba g-yul ngo sel //
T02TD1396E:120b-41: dgra bo 'dod yon mngon zhen mtha' //
T02TD1396E:120b-42: bdud dgra ye shes chen po yis //
T02TD1396E:120b-43: bdud 'dul ba ni gos pa med //
T02TD1396E:120b-44: bdud bzhi 'jigs pa dga' bzhi yis //
T02TD1396E:120b-45: 'gal phyogs spong ba sel bar byed //
T02TD1396E:120b-46: bdud kyi dpung rnams sna tshogs rtog / pham byed pa yang de nyid do //
T02TD1396E:120b-47: rdzogs pa thig le sangs rgyas bde //
T02TD1396E:120b-48: 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyi mchog / mchod 'os bza' ba'i dam tshig che //
T02TD1396E:120b-49: bstod 'os rig ma'i mkha' dbyings kyi //
T02TD1396E:120b-50: phyag gi 'os ni thal mo sbyor //
T02TD1396E:121a-1: tu zhen pa spangs pa dang //
T02TD1396E:121a-2: blang dor med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1396E:121a-3: rim gror byar 'os byang sems spel //
T02TD1396E:121a-5: nyan thos sogs pas bkur 'os pa'o //
T02TD1396E:121a-6: pha rol phyin pa'i theg pa pas //
T02TD1396E:121a-7: yon tan brjod par bya ba'i mchog rnal 'byor rgyud sogs phyag byar 'os //
T02TD1396E:121a-8: thabs dang shes rab thun mong gis //
T02TD1396E:121a-9: sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma'i rab //
T02TD1396E:121a-10: 'jig rten gsum po rtsa gsum la //
T02TD1396E:121a-11: gom gcig bgrod pa rlung 'pho ba //
T02TD1396E:121a-12: lnga bcu rtsa drug bzhi cha'o //
T02TD1396E:121a-13: rlung de rgyu dus nam mkha' ltar //
T02TD1396E:121a-14: rtog pa mtha' med rnam par gnon //
T02TD1396E:121a-15: gsum rig rgyu ba gsum po las //
T02TD1396E:121a-16: dbu ma rkyang ma dag pa ste //
T02TD1396E:121a-17: de yi yon tan mngon shes drug / ldan zhing rjes dran drug sogs thob //
T02TD1396E:121a-18: pha rol phyin pa'i theg par ni //
T02TD1396E:121a-19: byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid pa //
T02TD1396E:121a-20: sems dpa' che zhes mtshan gsol ba ;
T02TD1396E:121a-21: / dang po pa de 'dir dbu mar //
T02TD1396E:121a-22: zhugs pas rdzu 'phrul chen po dang //
T02TD1396E:121a-24: de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02TD1396E:121a-25: rtog pa'i mtha' yang de nyid do //
T02TD1396E:121a-26: shes rab gsum pa'i ye shes kyi //
T02TD1396E:121a-27: de nyid thob ni skrag pa med //
T02TD1396E:121a-28: bdag rig rang lus gzhan rig pa //
T02TD1396E:121a-29: shes rab thabs las thams cad rig / kun las 'phags pas lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1396E:121a-30: gang zag mchog ni 'di de'i lam //
T02TD1396E:121a-31: dper bya kun las 'das pa ste //
T02TD1396E:121a-32: zhes pa nyams myong lhan skyes te //
T02TD1396E:121a-33: bla ma'i ngag las byung ba'o //
T02TD1396E:121a-34: shes dang shes bya yul yul can //
T02TD1396E:121a-35: bdag po mchog ni gnyis med rtogs //
T02TD1396E:121a-36: gtso bo dh'u t'i byang chub lam //
T02TD1396E:121a-38: phyag rgya bzhi yi las chos dang //
T02TD1396E:121a-39: phyag rgya che dang dam rgya ste //
T02TD1396E:121a-40: chos kun phyag rgya bzhi yis bsdus //
T02TD1396E:121a-41: don ston pa ni lam dang rtags //
T02TD1396E:121a-42: gnyen po 'bras bu rnams la sbyor //
T02TD1396E:121a-43: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur bde ba'i rgyu //
T02TD1396E:121a-44: gnas kyi mchog ni ka ra na //
T02TD1396E:121a-45: byed pa drug cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02TD1396E:121a-46: nges 'byung gsum po sku gsum la //
T02TD1396E:121a-47: mtshan ni yang dag brjod chos 'di //
T02TD1396E:121a-48: 'gro don zhes ni lam pa'i dus //
T02TD1396E:121b-0: @121b don gyi rnam pa phyag rgya che //
T02TD1396E:121b-1: rnam dag dpal ni bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1396E:121b-2: 'jig rten gsum ni lus phyi nang //
T02TD1396E:121b-3: bar gsum yin la skal bzang che //
T02TD1396E:121b-4: dpral ba'i thig le bcu drug go //
T02TD1396E:121b-5: dpal ldan 'byor ba dga' bzhi sogs //
T02TD1396E:121b-6: kun byed pa ni gtum mo'o //
T02TD1396E:121b-7: 'jam dpal thig le ldan pa ni /
T02TD1396E:121b-8: ye shes chen po'i mchog yin no //
T02TD1396E:121b-9: de ltar shloka bco lnga ngo //
T02TD1396E:121b-10: bsnyen pa nye bsnyen sgrub pa dang //
T02TD1396E:121b-11: sgrub chen las sbyor khyad la sbyor //
T02TD1396E:121b-12: pha rol phyin rgyud rnam dag pa'o //
T02TD1396E:121b-13: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u bcu pa'o /
T02TD1396E:121b-15: // / le'u bcu gcig pa 'dud kyi brjod bya ye shes lnga ldan pa'o //
T02TD1396E:121b-16: sangs rgyas sku lnga la bstod pa'o //
T02TD1396E:121b-17: dang po spang bya khams gsum rtogs //
T02TD1396E:121b-18: nyon mongs gti mug gnyen po ni //
T02TD1396E:121b-19: chos dbyings ye shes sgo lnga dag / gzugs phud snang mdzad mig la ni //
T02TD1396E:121b-20: gti mug ye shes sa snying po //
T02TD1396E:121b-21: las rgya sna tshogs bdag de nyid //
T02TD1396E:121b-22: dga' ba dang po bum pa'i dbang //
T02TD1396E:121b-23: bzhi ba bsnyen pa sa yi khams //
T02TD1396E:121b-24: sprul pa'i sku dang bco brgyad ldan //
T02TD1396E:121b-25: de lta'i ye shes gtsug tor la //
T02TD1396E:121b-26: dang po dga' ba bzhis bstod pa //
T02TD1396E:121b-27: mchod sbyin rdo rje'i lus ngag yid //
T02TD1396E:121b-28: mchog khyod 'dud pa dga' ba'i dga' //
T02TD1396E:121b-29: bltas pas tshim pa'i bde ba ni //
T02TD1396E:121b-31: yang dag mthar 'gyur dga' ba'i mchog / bgad pas tshim ba rlung 'than pa //
T02TD1396E:121b-32: khyod la 'dud pa goms byed pa'o //
T02TD1396E:121b-33: stong nyid las byung dga' ba yis //
T02TD1396E:121b-34: lhan skyes lag bcangs reg bde myong //
T02TD1396E:121b-35: me rlung lus la khyab pa'o //
T02TD1396E:121b-37: sangs rgyas byang chub dga' ba yi //
T02TD1396E:121b-38: dga' bral 'khyud pas ham las ni //
T02TD1396E:121b-39: thig le ba thag 'bab pas bde //
T02TD1396E:121b-41: rkyen ma ltos pa skyong ba'o //
T02TD1396E:121b-42: gnyis pa'i spang bya bdag tu zhen //
T02TD1396E:121b-43: nyon mongs 'dod chags gnyen po ni //
T02TD1396E:121b-44: so sor rtog pa nyon yid 'gyur //
T02TD1396E:121b-45: 'du shes mtha' yas lce la ni //
T02TD1396E:121b-47: chos rgya mtshan med lha de nyid //
T02TD1396E:121b-48: dga' ba gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang //
T02TD1396E:121b-49: rgyas par bsgrub pa me yi khams //
T02TD1396E:121b-50: longs spyod rdzogs pa bco brgyad ldan //
T02TD1396E:122a-0: @122a * // de lta'i sdug bsngal gcod pa la //
T02TD1396E:122a-1: mchog dga'i dga' ba bzhi bstod pa //
T02TD1396E:122a-2: sangs rgyas chags pa mchog dga'i dga' //
T02TD1396E:122a-3: rdo rje padma las sbyor ba //
T02TD1396E:122a-4: snang stong shes pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1396E:122a-5: sangs rgyas 'dod pa mchog dga'i mchog / brtson 'grus bde ba cher 'phel ba //
T02TD1396E:122a-7: sangs rgyas dgyes pa mchog lhan skyes //
T02TD1396E:122a-8: phyi rol yul las log pa'i sems //
T02TD1396E:122a-9: brtan par gnas pa de la 'dud //
T02TD1396E:122a-10: sangs rgyas rol pa mchog dga' bral //
T02TD1396E:122a-11: chags pa rnams las chags med byas //
T02TD1396E:122a-13: gsungs pa'i spang bya mthar zhen pa //
T02TD1396E:122a-14: nyon mongs zhe sdang gnyen po ni //
T02TD1396E:122a-15: me long ye shes kun gzhi dag / rnam shes mi bskyod rna ba la //
T02TD1396E:122a-16: zhe sdang rdo rjer phyag rdor nyid //
T02TD1396E:122a-17: phyag rgya chen po rnam med sngags //
T02TD1396E:122a-18: dga' ba gsum pa gsum pa'i ngang //
T02TD1396E:122a-19: dbang dang sgrub chen chu yi khams //
T02TD1396E:122a-20: chos kyi sku ste bco brgyad ldan //
T02TD1396E:122a-21: de lta'i rdo rje rnon po la //
T02TD1396E:122a-22: lhan skyes dga' ba bzhis bstod pa //
T02TD1396E:122a-23: sangs rgyas 'dzum pa lhan skyes dga' //
T02TD1396E:122a-24: bde chen rgyas pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1396E:122a-25: sangs rgyas bzhad pa lhan skyes mchog / bde stong bral ba khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1396E:122a-26: sangs rgyas gsung nyid lhan skyes skyes //
T02TD1396E:122a-28: sangs rgyas thugs la lhan skyes bral //
T02TD1396E:122a-30: bzhi pa'i spang bya dgag sgrub po //
T02TD1396E:122a-31: nyon mongs nga rgyal gnyen po ni //
T02TD1396E:122a-32: mnyam med ye shes yid rnams shes //
T02TD1396E:122a-33: tshor ba rin 'byung sna la ni //
T02TD1396E:122a-34: ser sna rdo rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs //
T02TD1396E:122a-35: dam rgya rnam smin ye shes dang //
T02TD1396E:122a-36: dga' ba bzhi pa dbang bzhi pa //
T02TD1396E:122a-37: drag po nyi grub nam mkha'i khams //
T02TD1396E:122a-38: rdo rje sku ste bco brgyad ldan //
T02TD1396E:122a-39: de lta'i ngag ni dbang phyug la //
T02TD1396E:122a-40: dga' bral dga' ba bzhis bstod pa //
T02TD1396E:122a-41: med pa las byung dga' bral dga' //
T02TD1396E:122a-42: dpe brgyad rtogs pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1396E:122a-43: sangs rgyas 'byung ba dga' bral mchog / dga' la zhen med khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1396E:122a-44: nam mkha' las byung dga' bral ldan //
T02TD1396E:122a-45: spros bral bde chen khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1396E:122a-46: ye shes las byung dga' bral bral //
T02TD1396E:122a-47: gnyen po zad pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1396E:122b-0: lnga pa'i spang bya spang @122b bya med ;
T02TD1396E:122b-1: / nyon mongs phrag dog gnyen po ni //
T02TD1396E:122b-2: bya grub ye shes rnam shes brgyad //
T02TD1396E:122b-3: 'du byed don grub lus la ni //
T02TD1396E:122b-4: dbang phyug rdo rje sgrib rnams sel //
T02TD1396E:122b-5: sna tshogs bya dga' dus mtha' bskyil //
T02TD1396E:122b-6: ye shes dga' ba dbang rdzogs pa //
T02TD1396E:122b-7: mngon spyod sgrub byed rlung gi khams //
T02TD1396E:122b-8: bde chen sku ste bco brgyad ldan //
T02TD1396E:122b-9: de 'dra'i ye shes sku can la //
T02TD1396E:122b-10: ye shes dga' ba ba zhis bstod pa //
T02TD1396E:122b-11: sgyu 'phrul dra ba ye shes dga' //
T02TD1396E:122b-13: sangs rgyas rol ston ye shes mchog / ma 'gags gsal ba khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1396E:122b-14: thams cad thams cad ye shes ldan //
T02TD1396E:122b-15: phyag rgya che ldan khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1396E:122b-16: ye shes sku nyid ye shes bral //
T02TD1396E:122b-18: de ltar sku lnga bdag nyid can //
T02TD1396E:122b-19: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la //
T02TD1396E:122b-20: rtag tu 'dud pa rdo rje'i lus //
T02TD1396E:122b-21: khams lnga dag pas shloka / lnga yi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1396E:122b-22: 'dud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o /
T02TD1396E:122b-24: // / le'u bcu gnyis pa sngags kyi //
T02TD1396E:122b-25: skabs la don dang tshig dang ni //
T02TD1396E:122b-26: rtags kyi sngags dang gsum du 'dod //
T02TD1396E:122b-27: dang po sangs rgyas thugs yin la //
T02TD1396E:122b-28: gnyis pa a'a li k'a li'o //
T02TD1396E:122b-29: gsum pa lha dang ye shes dang //
T02TD1396E:122b-30: phrin las bzhi la sbyor ba ni //
T02TD1396E:122b-31: rtags kyi sngags su 'dod pa yin //
T02TD1396E:122b-32: de yang bshad na 'di lta ste //
T02TD1396E:122b-33: aom ni ye shes lnga yin la //
T02TD1396E:122b-35: ngo bos stong pa aa bh'a ba //
T02TD1396E:122b-36: de nyid bla ma'i gdams pa yis //
T02TD1396E:122b-37: stong par myong ba sva bh'a ba //
T02TD1396E:122b-38: dbyer med rnam dag bi shuddha //
T02TD1396E:122b-39: badzra gnyis med ye shes la //
T02TD1396E:122b-40: aa a'a aom aa: dga' ba bzhi //
T02TD1396E:122b-41: pra kri ti rgyu lam 'bras bu'i dus //
T02TD1396E:122b-42: ba ri shuddha: sgrib med pa'o //
T02TD1396E:122b-44: ya du ta snang stong gnyis med pa'o //
T02TD1396E:122b-45: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni //
T02TD1396E:122b-46: dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD1396E:122b-47: bde chen dzny'a na k'a ya la ;
T02TD1396E:122b-48: / ma nydzu shr'i ni thig le'i khams //
T02TD1396E:122b-50: t'a zhes de las mchog med pa'o //
T02TD1396E:122b-51: mu pa d'a ni zag pa'o //
T02TD1396E:122b-52: ye ti aa ni de ltar na //
T02TD1396E:122b-53: mi 'dzag dga' ba lam mchog go //
T02TD1396E:122b-54: lam mchog de nyid gang zhe na //
T02TD1396E:122b-55: shin tu bsdus pa'i rgyud 'di yin //
T02TD1396E:123a-0: rgyas bsdus gnyis su ji lta @123a * //
T02TD1396E:123a-3: aa a'a mi skye las skye'o //
T02TD1396E:123a-4: sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya //
T02TD1396E:123a-5: ha ra ha ra zhes pa ni //
T02TD1396E:123a-6: so sor sdud pa'i rtags mthar phyin //
T02TD1396E:123a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs //
T02TD1396E:123a-8: ha ra so sor yod pa ste //
T02TD1396E:123a-9: ha ras bsdus pa mnyam pa nyid ;
T02TD1396E:123a-10: / aom h'um hr'i: ni gnas 'byung 'jug / bha ga b'a na ni nyi khri dang //
T02TD1396E:123a-11: bzhi stong bcom pas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1396E:123a-12: srog rtsol yan lag yin par 'dod //
T02TD1396E:123a-13: dzny'a na m'urtti bsam gtan te //
T02TD1396E:123a-14: rjes la b'a g'i shva ra na //
T02TD1396E:123a-16: sarbba dha rma ga ga na /
T02TD1396E:123a-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag go //
T02TD1396E:123a-18: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha /
T02TD1396E:123a-19: zhes pa 'dzin pa'i yan lag go //
T02TD1396E:123a-20: dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a: zhes pas rjes su dran pa'o //
T02TD1396E:123a-22: khams gsum po ni dag pa'o //
T02TD1396E:123a-23: sngags kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1396E:123a-24: bcu gsum rjes su yi rang ba //
T02TD1396E:123a-25: sa mchog bcu gnyis dag pa yi //
T02TD1396E:123a-26: le'u bcu gnyis bshad pa'i rjes //
T02TD1396E:123a-27: de nas sdud pa po chen pos //
T02TD1396E:123a-28: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po //
T02TD1396E:123a-29: chos sku spros bral mi 'gyur che //
T02TD1396E:123a-30: ngag tu dga' zhing sems mgu nas //
T02TD1396E:123a-31: lus kyis thal mo sbyar byas te //
T02TD1396E:123a-32: mgon po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1396E:123a-33: rtags su sh'akya thub pa ste //
T02TD1396E:123a-35: de bzhin gshegs zhes bshad pa'o //
T02TD1396E:123a-36: ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas de la //
T02TD1396E:123a-37: yan lag smad lnga lta bu yis //
T02TD1396E:123a-38: sgrib lnga bsal nas de nyid rtogs //
T02TD1396E:123a-39: rtogs don de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD1396E:123a-40: de ni mgon po sangs rgyas lam //
T02TD1396E:123a-41: gsang ba'i bdag nyid la bzhugs pas //
T02TD1396E:123a-42: bla mas lag na rdo rje yi //
T02TD1396E:123a-43: bde chen ye shes gtad pa yis //
T02TD1396E:123a-44: khro bo spang bya nyon mongs las //
T02TD1396E:123a-45: rgyal po chen por de gyur to //
T02TD1396E:123a-46: rang 'dra'i sna tshogs snod ldan brten //
T02TD1396E:123a-47: gzhan ni 'khor bzhi la sogs pa //
T02TD1396E:123a-48: smin cing cho ga ma nyams pa //
T02TD1396E:123a-49: lhan cig 'dug la gsang ba'i don //
T02TD1396E:123a-50: yon tan kun gyis bstod nas ni //
T02TD1396E:123a-51: rab tu dga' mgu'i tshig 'di skad //
T02TD1396E:123a-52: ngag tu brjod cing brtan par byed //
T02TD1396E:123b-0: mgon po bde chen rgyal po @123b la ;
T02TD1396E:123b-1: / bdag cag rnams ni yi rang ngo //
T02TD1396E:123b-2: legs so gsang sngags don spyod pas //
T02TD1396E:123b-3: legs so khro rgyu spangs pa legs //
T02TD1396E:123b-4: legs par gsungs ni rang spyod ltar //
T02TD1396E:123b-5: gzhan la ston pa 'thad pa yin //
T02TD1396E:123b-6: rnam grol 'bras bu sku gsum mo //
T02TD1396E:123b-8: dgos pa 'gro ba mgon med pa //
T02TD1396E:123b-9: nyon mongs 'dam du bying rnams dang //
T02TD1396E:123b-11: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni //
T02TD1396E:123b-12: rdo rje 'chang chen thob pa yi //
T02TD1396E:123b-13: thabs su 'gro ba'i don chen mdzad //
T02TD1396E:123b-14: stong pa bde ba'i snying po can //
T02TD1396E:123b-15: kun rdzob sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi //
T02TD1396E:123b-16: rnam pa rtags tsam tshul bstan pa //
T02TD1396E:123b-17: mtshan brjod pa yi gsung rab 'di //
T02TD1396E:123b-18: rnam dag legs pa'i lam yin no //
T02TD1396E:123b-19: zab cing don la yangs pa thabs //
T02TD1396E:123b-21: don chen 'gro ba rigs lnga yi //
T02TD1396E:123b-22: don bgyid pa ni gang 'dul ston //
T02TD1396E:123b-23: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus gsum gyi //
T02TD1396E:123b-24: yul lam gnas sam lam 'di ni //
T02TD1396E:123b-25: mar me mdzad sogs rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1396E:123b-26: sangs rgyas dus gsum bzhugs rnams kyis //
T02TD1396E:123b-29: de nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po //
T02TD1396E:123b-30: dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya yin //
T02TD1396E:123b-31: yang na khar sa p'a ni yin //
T02TD1396E:123b-32: sku gsum phrin las gnyis dag pas //
T02TD1396E:123b-33: shloka lnga rnam par dag / zab pa'i don la mos rnams la //
T02TD1396E:123b-34: gsang don mthar thug 'dir brjod byas //
T02TD1396E:123b-35: / sarba p'a ni bzod par gsol //
T02TD1396E:123b-36: dge ba 'gro la yongs su bsngo //
T02TD1396E:123b-37: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa bdud rtsi'i thigs pa sgron ma gsal ba zhib mo rnam par 'thags [?] pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1396E:123b-38: rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs kyi rdul la reg pa'i pandi ta chen po aa nu pa ma rakshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1396E:123b-40: // / dpal byang ri bkra shis kyi gtsug lag khang du kha che'i mkhas pa su ga ta shr'i dang /
T02TD1396E:123b-41: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dha rma k'i rti dang dge slong rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o //
T02TD1396E:123b-42: rgyal ba rnams kyi bgrod pa mthar thug pa /
T02TD1396E:123b-43: bstan pa'i snying po rdo rje theg pa'i lam //
T02TD1396E:123b-44: bya spyod rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud //
T02TD1396E:123b-45: gsung rab rgya mtsho'i bcud bsdus rdo rje'i tshig /
T02TD1396E:124a-0: @124a * // zab cing rtogs dka' rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mchog / mtshan brjod glur blangs yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhung //
T02TD1396E:124a-1: ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar snang gyur kyang //
T02TD1396E:124a-2: zab mo'i don mchog kun gyis ma rnyed pas //
T02TD1396E:124a-3: spyan ras gzigs dbang dri ma med pa'i 'od //
T02TD1396E:124a-4: rgya cher 'grel pas zab ba'i don bshad pa //
T02TD1396E:124a-5: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud don legs bkrol yin //
T02TD1396E:124a-6: de las rab dga' mtsho las 'o len bzhin //
T02TD1396E:124a-7: zab don bsdus pa'i man ngag bstan bcos 'di //
T02TD1396E:124a-8: dpe med bsrungs pas snod ldan sems can don //
T02TD1396E:124a-9: bdud rtsi thigs pa 'chi med grub pa bris //
T02TD1396E:124a-10: smon lam mthu yis kha ba can ljongs 'dir //
T02TD1396E:124a-11: su ga ta shr'i lnga brgya'i kun mkhyen gyis //
T02TD1396E:124a-12: skal bar ldan pa'i dge slong rdor rgyal la //
T02TD1396E:124a-13: legs sbyar skad kyis rgyas par bshad pa las //
T02TD1396E:124a-14: tshig don longs par gyur te gsung sgros dang //
T02TD1396E:124a-15: mthun par 'grel 'di 'bad pa chen pos bsgyur ;
T02TD1396E:124a-16: / sgra yi byings la byang bar ma gyur pas //
T02TD1396E:124a-17: legs bsgyur mkhas rnams rab nongs bzod par bzhes //
T02TD1396E:124a-18: gsang ba bsgrags pa mkha' 'gros bzod par gsol //
T02TD1396E:124a-19: legs bshad legs pa sgyur dge ba 'gro la bsngo /
